campaign.story:
We all love the feeling of working at a neat and tidy desk.
But as we get on with our day and mess piles up, so does the clutter in our headspace – making it difficult to stay focused.
But it doesn’t have to be that way.

Transform Your Workspace 
Introducing the Orbitkey Desk Mat – a clever solution to organise and optimise your workspace; helping you stay productive and do your best work everyday.
Available in 2 colours (Black and Stone) and 2 sizes (Medium and Large) to suit any style and space.
Press Kit – orbitkey.com/deskmat-press
For Press Enquiries – press@orbitkey.com

 Create a Clutter-Free Zone 
The Desk Mat creates visual structure in your work area, helping you organise your work tools in a defined space. By being more intentional with what you keep on your desk, the Desk Mat helps to reduce clutter – allowing you to focus on the task at hand, free of unnecessary distractions.

Prevent Paper Pile-Up
Underneath the top layer is a convenient document hideaway for you to store loose papers and notes so they don’t pile up around you – just like sweeping mess under a rug! Keep them out of sight but easily accessible whenever you need a quick refresher or to jot down notes.

Your Work Essentials Organised
With a dedicated space for stationery and small accessories in the toolbar, you’ll always have quick access to your work essentials, whenever you need them.

Cables Kept in Place
The magnetic cable holder can be moved anywhere along the toolbar to keep your cable in place and always within reach. No more tangles or cables falling off the table!

 Stylish and Functional Work Surface
The soft and elegant vegan leather will transform any desk into a warm and comfortable workspace, providing a smooth surface to write on and to use your mouse with ease – suitable for both right and left-handed users.
Feel professional, confident, and in control with a simple addition that can make a huge difference.

Made to Last 
The Orbitkey Desk Mat protects your desk from scratches, stains and spills. The premium vegan leather is exceptionally durable, water-repellent and can be easily wiped clean.
Made to last and ready to take on whatever the day brings, helping you do your best work.
The Orbitkey Desk Mat will help you keep your desk tidy throughout the day – so you’re always organised and ready for the next. 


Each Desk Mat comes with 1 magnetic cable holder. Add additional cable holders to manage multiple cables.
Design Process
We always try to be conscious of what we’re designing – focusing less on the quantity, and more on the quality of a small, but considered selection of products. Our hearts, minds and even weekends were poured into this new product, and here’s a small lookbook to give you an idea of how we went about designing the Orbitkey Desk Mat.
 About Orbitkey 
We believe in clever organisation for better living.
Since 2013, we've launched 4 crowdfunding campaigns, with over 33,000 backers, raising over USD 2 million.
We love Kickstarter. Not only did you help bring Orbitkey to life, you also allow us to focus on making great products and keep doing the things we love – without the influence of outside investors.
We are a team of 21 passionate individuals based in Melbourne, Australia – driven by design, innovation and clever organisation. This new project is the result of continuous feedback and hard work over the past few months. We hope to have you join us on our journey towards better living.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have a pretty good track record with our previous 4 campaigns – with most rewards being shipped on time or with a 1-month delay at most. Our previous campaigns have also given us valuable experience in all aspects of bringing a product to life and running a crowdfunding campaign.

It has better prepared us in the challenges associated with tooling, production, logistics, communication, and delivering a high-quality product.

However, there are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a product to life.

In the case of encountering unavoidable obstacles, we have always handled them swiftly and efficiently, and have always conducted things in the best interest of our backers and Orbitkey family. We always keep our backers updated with complete transparency.

We will do our very best to ensure we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile whenever possible. Thanks for believing in us!


COVID-19

We're sure that the COVID-19 situation is probably on everyone's mind right now, so we'd like to take this opportunity to update you on how this might affect production.

Our manufacturing partners are back at 100% capacity and have been working closely with us to ensure that everything will progress smoothly, whilst maintaining the highest standard of safety and hygiene.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
We've made a commitment that everything we do and build needs to add value and help our community live better lives. If they don’t, we should rethink why we’re doing it, and work out a better approach. Our products are designed with the best materials and built to last – tested thoroughly to withstand heavy use. We love that we're still seeing plenty of backers from our first Kickstarter campaign in 2013 still using the rewards they received then.
Reusability and recyclability
Our products are designed to last. However, should you encounter any problems with any of the parts, you can let us know and we'll be able to send you a specific replacement part.
Sustainable materials
The base of the Desk Mat is made of 100% recycled PET felt. On top of that, all our packaging material is plastic-free and 100% recyclable.
Environmentally friendly factories
All our factories have been carefully selected and are partners we've been working with for several years. We have team members on the ground who visit the factories on a regular basis to ensure quality, ethical and environmental standards are upheld.
Sustainable Distribution
We plan to optimise our shipping routes by utilising sea freight to transport bulk quantities to local warehouses to reduce the carbon footprint of our delivery plan.
Something else
Like Kickstarter, we've already committed to offset our carbon footprint in 2020. We are proud to be a Climate Neutral Certified brand.

Happy new year everyone... Welcome to 2021!

We're taking a slightly different approach this year after the craziness that engulfed us all in 2020. You can still expect us to push the boundaries when it comes to developing new products, but this year we are committed to be even more focussed on feedback, analysing data and making sure we capture learnings, both internally within our team and also from our customers.

We hope this update finds you all well and safe. Here in Melbourne, we're just coming out of a month's long lockdown so our thoughts go out to those in Europe who are heading into one, as well all our Orbitkey family in other parts of the world who continue to be affected by Covid-19.

campaign.story:
$150,000 Stretch Goal... UNLOCKED!
There are now two new color options for the EDC Organizer and Detachable Center Pouch. You will be able to choose from black, gray, and tan/brown.
$75,000 Stretch Goal... UNLOCKED!
Each EDC Organizer will now come with a detachable center pouch that will serve two purposes; separate both sides of the organizer to protect items from touching/scratching each other AND provide a mesh slot + zippered pocket to store even more stuff!
Smaller detachable pouch prototype shown here. Production version will be 4" x 6"
There are many different definitions for the acronym "EDC", but in this project we mean "every day carry," a collection of useful items that are consistently carried on person every day. The main reasons for having EDC are utility and preparedness; to help individuals overcome simple everyday problems, and to prepare someone for unexpected and possibly dangerous situations. (Source: Wikipedia)
Example of every-day carry items.
During our search for an organizer to carry our own EDC products, we've learned that there are a lot of great organizers out there. However, there were two problems we encountered:
1) There wasn't an organizer small enough to carry a lighter load that also gave us the ability to expand to carry larger items when we needed to.
2) We found that a lot of organizers featured similar, limited strap configurations on both sides of their inner compartments. We wanted more strap versatility.
This is what led us to design our own.
Whether you’re a daily commuter, emergency responder, avid traveler, or work-from-home EDC enthusiast staying organized is important to be truly prepared for anything; especially when it comes to keeping those small or large every day carry items close at hand.
 Compression & Expansion Zipper 
EDC organizers come in various sizes and capacities but ours is one size with dual capacity. So what we did was we took the expansion zipper feature from our ZIP Travel Waist Pack project 3 years ago, and put it into the organizer...
This extra zipper is designed solely for expanding or collapsing the overall depth of the bag to give you more or less space for storing items. This helps you add larger things such as bandages and medicine bottles, or to save space when you’re traveling or packing light.
GRID-STYLE STRAPS
Elastic grid-style straps isn't new to the storage industry, however to the best of our knowledge, they have never been used inside of a zippered EDC organizer until now...
Example of every-day carry items inside the organizer.
Our multipurpose EDC organizer provides you with plenty of storage straps for storing and securing all the little things you’ll need to provide emergency repairs, keep your tech device cables organized, or simply be better prepared for any camping or survival activities.
Rugged Materials
We know that you might use this all-purpose EDC carry bag for some pretty serious outdoor or emergency response needs which is why it has high tear and puncture resistance and designed with reinforced zippers and pulls.
Multiple Carry Options
We’ve added a small handle at the top of the bag for some quick grab-and-go use as well as two long MOLLE compatible snaps that let you attach it to larger backpack or bag so you don’t misplace it or leave it behind. 
Morale Patches
On the outside of our rugged EDC organizer pouch you’ll find a Velcro (hook & loop) patch area that will let you attach one of your favorite patches such as a country flag, military unit, military branch, red cross, or a patch from the best TV show ever!
Water-Resistant Fabric
Made with water-resistant 500D fabric to help keep your gear drier on the inside when you’re traveling, working outside, or stuck working in a bit of inclement weather like rain or snow.
Please Note: The organizer is NOT waterproof and does not float on water.
YKK Zippers and Pulls
Each EDC organizer features thick pulls attached to the zipper base with reinforced silicone wrapped around them for added strength and pull resilience.
VERSATILITY
Our organizer allows a wider range of emergency response or outdoor travel gear while also adding a sleek, trendy look that matches its toughness. 
Example of tools inside the organizer.
 Weight: 8 ounces
We went through several different design options. Here are the most recent illustrations showing the first and second styles which ultimately led to the final design.
Please note that you are pledging on the EDC Organizer ONLY. Every-day carry items (e.g. Apple AirPods, pocket knives, flashlights, tools, velcro patches, etc.) that are shown in the photos, videos, and animations are for educational purposes only.
After the campaign, all backers will provide shipping information and confirm pledge rewards through BackerKit, where we will offer the opportunity to purchase additional EDC Organizers, ZEROHOUR products, and other accessories (ADD-ONS) to ship together with your reward. Instructions will be provided at the end of the campaign in a backer update.
First Aid Survival Kit
We understand that putting together a First Aid Survival Kit by purchasing items one-by-one yourself can be tedious. So to make things easier, we've teamed up with a manufacturing partner and put together an awesome package for you. The First Aid Survival Kit ADD-ON will include the following items: 
25 products totaling 240 pieces will make setting up your organizer a breeze. Available as a BackerKit ADD-ON!
International Backers:
Please check with your country's knife import laws before purchasing the First Aid Survival Kit ADD-ON. The knife specifications are as follows: It is a folding knife that has a flipper tab for one-hand operation, there is a liner-lock that keeps the blade locked when opened, and the blade's total length is 3.25 inches / 8.25 cm.
In the event that the knife is not allowed in your country, you will have the option to purchase the ADD-ON without the pocket knife. 
Example of a First Aid Survival Kit setup.
Bonus:
We are also including a RED CROSS on a black background patch (not to be confused with the ICRC red cross that is on a white background) for your EDC Organizer if you purchase the First Aid Survival Kit ADD-ON. The patch by itself will also be available as an ADD-ON.
For USA backers; single organizer rewards we will ship via USPS First Class Mail (5-7 Business Days), two or more organizers will typically ship via USPS Priority Mail (2-3 Business Days). For international backers; we are going to be using USPS ePacket which varies between 10 - 21 Business Days. As of July 1st, 2020 ePacket is ONLY available in these countries:
Australia
Belgium
Canada
Croatia
Denmark
Estonia
France
Germany
Gibraltar
Hong Kong
Ireland
Israel
Japan
Lithuania
Luxembourg
Netherlands
New Zealand
Poland
Portugal
Singapore
South Korea
Sweden
United Kingdom
If your country is not listed above (or if your country is listed but you want your package to arrive faster), you can still pledge and we will ship it by USPS International First Class Mail but we HIGHLY recommend that you consider upgrading to FedEx Priority Mail (3 to 5 Business Days; Guaranteed Service) otherwise your package may be at risk for getting lost or stolen. FedEx will be available as an ADD-ON on BackerKit at the end of the campaign. 
With the support of our backers, we've raised over $1,000,000 on Kickstarter to create ZEROHOUR products, which have been featured on The Today Show, CNet, Yahoo! Tech, and Discovery Science Channel. Backers, media, and consumers support us because we know how to reinvent products, and we stand by our work with limited lifetime warranties.
Thank you for your support as we welcome the EDC Organizer to the ZEROHOUR family!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our team has managed fourteen prior Kickstarter campaigns from start to finished product. We have gone through all the necessary steps in developing and producing the EDC organizer. We are fortunate to have already paid our manufacturing partners in advance for the raw materials and an early production run. We now need you, our loyal backers, to help us meet the minimum 1,000 quantity order requirements and shipping costs. Your pledge shows us that you believe in our vision for innovative products, and in return, we pledge to deliver a high-quality reward to you.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
We are using a very durable 500D nylon material which has a high abrasion, tear, and water resistance.

campaign.story:
ATMOBLUE
The World’s Most Compact Air Purification System. Blocks 99.9% of Air Particulates
ADD-ONS & ACCESSORIES 
** TO ORDER FILTERS AND/OR SKIN SETS, SIMPLY ADD THE DOLLAR AMOUNT OF THOSE ITEMS TO YOUR PLEDGE. 
IF FOR INSTANCE YOU WOULD LIKE TO ADD 1 PACK OF FILTERS, SIMPLY ADD $20 TO YOUR PLEDGE. SAME FOR SKINS. YOU MAY ADD UP TO 10 PACKS OF FILTERS, PER PLEDGE. WE WILL FOLLOW UP WITH A SURVEY CONFIRMING YOUR FINAL ORDER. 
AWARDS
Not your average mask:
ATMOBLUE is the world’s first wearable, smart air purifier. Our patented air filtration system uses industrial grade, replaceable filters, blocking 99.9% of air particles. 
ATMOBLUE's unparalleled breathing experience utilizes many of the cutting edge technologies found in high-end purifiers today but offers the added benefits of mobility, style and comfort. With excess air being produced on-demand, users of ATMOBLUE always have access to fresh, filtered air.

OUR STORY
In 2016, while living abroad, the creators of ATMOBLUE experienced hazardous air levels for the first time. While various masks on the market offered protection from larger particles such as sand and pollen, very few masks effectively filtered smaller particles such as bacteria and PM2.5. This was how the idea to create a wearable, air purification system came to mind.
After months of research and development, the team created ATMOBLUE, launching an initial prototype in Asia. The feedback was incredible. ATMOBLUE received rave reviews, publications and awards. Today, building on top of their initial success and prototype, the team behind ATMOBLUE is ready to introduce a new and improved version to the world!
Significant upgrades have been made to ATMOBLUE including new and improved batteries, in-built mask controls, upgraded long-lasting HEPA filters (150 hours of use time), as well as a newly designed and patented head strap. In addition to these upgrades, ATMOBLUE has been updated to fit within FCC and UL standards and is currently undergoing certification reviews for US and global sales. ATMOBLUE is currently RoHS, SRCC and QCQ, certified. By funding this campaign, you will be first in line for ATMOBLUE.
At this time, you may only purchase ATMOBLUE via Kickstarter so please avoid third party websites and sales links as they are either old or fraudulent. Unfortunately this is quite common with successful campaigns.
For additional questions or investment and distribution inquiries feel free to contact us at support@atmoblue.com or directly via Kickstarter messenger. 
We look forward to this journey and can’t wait to get ATMOBLUE into your hands! 

FEATURES:
Replaceable Industrial Grade H13 HEPA Filters
Blocks 99.97% of air particulates 
Average use time is 150 hours
High Quality, Multi-Fold design
Traditional filters are flat and are quickly consumed. Our unique filters are made of up meticulous folds, compressing the flat surface area of two 9.5 squared inch sheets, into two compact filter blocks which slide right into your mask
N95 < N99 < H13 HEPA Filters
You may have heard the term N95. This simply means 95% of air particles are being captured. At the higher end of the spectrum, N99 (99%) masks are offered for more industrial applications such as painting or waste cleanup. Moving one step further ATMOBLUE's, H13 HEPA filters block 99.97% of particles which are 0.3 microns in diameter or larger. To give you a bit of context, one strand of human hair is about 75 microns across!
If used properly ATMOBLUE can reduce the amount of toxic air you breath in by up to 99.9%. ATMOBLUE cannot diagnose, cure, treat, or prevent any illness or condition related to the inhalation of toxic air, bacteria, viruses, smoke or fine air particulates.
Follow link to learn more about HEPA technology: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HEPA



Innovative Air Flow Technology
Dual, high-speed, centrifugal fans continuously supply filtered air to create a refreshing breathing environment.
Three airflow control settings. Users adjust speeds as needed
Positive Air Pressure allows users to breath effortlessly with zero resistance.
The term positive airflow means excess air or “positive air” being pushed into the mask and out through its vents. Because of this solution positive air pushes out exhaled air increasing the overall effectiveness of the mask by removing unwanted bacteria from the breathing zone. 
Designed for the most extreme conditions ATMOBLUE’s multiple airflow settings allow users to switch between light mode, when sitting idle on the train or a car, to high strength when jogging through the city or on the job.
Depending on your use, such as fan speed, your rechargeable ATMOBLUE system runs continuously from 3 – 5 hours. When battery life is running low a red indication light notifies users when to recharge. Simply plug into any USB port until your indicator light turns white again. 


Lightweight silicone seal
Dermatologically friendly silicone creates a soft but airtight seal keeping good air in and bad air out. ATOMBLUE wont leave marks on your face after each use and can be worn with glasses without fogging up vision.
ATMOBLUE’s fresh air system combined with our unique silicon solution give users a truly enjoyable breathing experience. That means, no nasty scent or moist fabric touching your face.
Designed to fits various face sizes.
Our unique silicon seal was designed with users in mind. We compiled data of over 1000 individuals faces and created a unique solution which adapts to various sized faces. ATMOBLUE's soft, lightweight silicone seal contours around users faces leaving enough room for movement and flexibility. 

Patented head strap design for maximum range and comfort
Our patented head strap system allows users to move about comfortably in any direction. If you’ve ever worn a mask you know how frustrating head straps can be as they cause unnecessary pressure behind your ears or simply fall off your head when moving around.
With our unique strap-channel design, the continuous head-strap flows through the mask, around your neck and head, creating a full range of continuous motion.
Designed with athletes in mind we used high-quality,  flexible, materials allowing for a stretch when using your mobile device or looking around your periphery. ATMOBLUE’s strap system in combination with our soft silicone seal allows for a tight, secure fit with superior comfort and style. 


Compact design & Interchangeable skins
Showcase your unique style with ATMOBLUE's modular skin system. Available in four color configurations: Smoke, Pearl, Cement Grey, and Light Pink
Replaceable covers allow your mask to transform and adapt to your style and environment. Simply remove the magnetic HEPA caps and pop off the front of the mask. Once you’ve chosen one your ideal color skin, simply attach and go.
Designed to be worn around your neck when not in use or in your carrying bag, ATMOBLUE’s compact design features a lightweight design of only 190 grams.

APP control (Unlocked with Stretch goal)
As an added bonus, all ATMOBLUE units come standard with built-in software & APP control. The device management APP provides real air-time quality indicators, tracks personal metrics and most importantly offers dynamic air flow controls.
Our patented i02 air control algorithm allows users airflow to automatically adjust according to their activity. If the user suddenly picks up speed, say while working or exercising, the APP automatically increases fan speed, reducing breathing resistance and offering more fresh air on demand. Over time we plan to release new updates to the mask for extended capabilities.
PLAY

The ATMOBLUE App in action! 
With the ATMOBLUE app users can interact with their mask, confirm filter life, personalize airflow settings or simply check the air quality index in their area.
STRETCH GOALS
Once the following Stretch Goals are met we will be unlocking the following upgrades for free! Share with your friends and loved ones to get more cool perks with your ATMOBLUE. 
Long Lasting Battery Pack - $179,000 USD – High-Capacity Batteries for longer charge (up to 8 hours)
Extra Filter Cartridges - $895,000  USD – x1, Filter Pack of 6 (3 cartridge sets)
Extra Skin Set - $1,790,000  USD – x1, Interchangeable Skin Set (choose your color)
ATMOBLUE App - $3,580,000 USD – Device Management Application unlocks Enhanced Capabilities such as filter change notifications, auto airflow and more.
Lifetime Membership - $8,950,000 USD – All Backers receive a Lifetime Membership which includes a 20% Discount on all accessories including filters!

PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT
ATMOBLUE: Product development overview showcasing discoveries and challenges as we moved from concept through manufacturing. 
 Early Concept Sketch
Early Prototype
Form-finding with 3D Printed Prototypes 
Internal Components and Form Rationalization in CAD
Fully functional Prototype
ATMOBLUE is born!
Fully assembled ATMOBLUE & Packaging Sample
TEAM
The team behind ATMOBLUE is made up by an international team of strategists, designers and engineers, who are on a mission to provide clean air, water and food to all.  
In 2016 the team created ATMOBLUE to help offset the negative impacts caused to humans by toxic air.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
- Certification & Timeline - To speed this up we began this process in late march and should be fully certified by early April, just in time for shipment to our first backers.

- High demand of filters - To solve this we have pre-secured 2000 filters with our manufactures for our early bird backers.

- Device Management APP - We aim to ship ATMOBLUE with our powerful Device management Application. To do this we need to raise significant funding early on. By sharing this campaign with your friends and family (over facebook and other social media channels) you can help carry this campaign through our APP stretch goal and unlock all of ATMOBLUE's awesome smart features.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
ATMOBLUE was designed and built to withstand the test of time. Our unique mask features high-quality injection molded plastic as well as a durable silicone seal and head strap. 

To ensure quality during and after assembly we personally visited factories and designed a full assembly procedure. Furthermore project managers have been placed on site to ensure safe storage and transport. To further ensure durability we are offering a 90-day limited warranty covering all parts and components. See FAQ for more information.

updates.update_content:
Hi Backers,
Thank you all for the amazing feedback! We have received so many kind messages from backers who absolutely love their ATMOBLUE. For those of you awaiting your reward, we are working hard to make sure everyone gets their shipments asap. We appreciate your continued patience.
The past couple of days/weeks we have been diligently working on shipping June orders as well as all International Orders, Skin sets and Filters. If you have not yet received your tracking information you can expect to receive this information in the coming days and throughout the following weeks. Processing International orders for air masks during Covid times has proven tricky, but we've done our best to ensure all customs departments have what they needed in order to clear your rewards.

Hey Backers!
We hope you are all well out there! It’s been a few days since our campaign closed so we wanted to share a few updates on our progress. For those of you looking to add items to your pledge, such as filters and skin sets, you will no longer able to do so via Kickstarter. Instead, you will now be able to add these items directly through our survey which we will be sending out this coming week.

Thank you for your incredible support backers!
It’s been such a fun journey together. Our campaign brought together close to 900 backers from over 40 countries across the globe. With your amazing support we were able to raise over $190,000 in under 30 days, bringing us one step closer to our mission to provide Clean Air for All!

project_data.project_name: ATMOBLUE : Clean Air For All

campaign.story:
Nest will help you declutter and organise – allowing you to be more productive and efficient at work.

At Orbitkey, we believe that life’s better when everything has its place. Which is why we designed Nest –  to help you spend less time searching through mess looking for things, and more time on things that matter. 
For Press Inquiries — press@orbitkey.com



In this in-depth review, Ed from Rushfaster gives a detailed walk-through and demonstrates how the Orbitkey Nest can help you organise – to suit any lifestyle:

Matt shows us how he uses the Orbitkey Nest and why Nest stands out for him – as a functional solution to help him organise:


1. Home For All Your Essentials 
Comfortably store all your daily necessities inside Nest. Separate the top tray from the internal storage to easily retrieve items while you work at your desk.

 2. Always Within Reach 
The leather lid serves as a beautiful tray for the things you regularly reach for while you work – maximising desk space and keeping things in place.

 3. Always Charged 
The wireless charger embedded in the lid will keep your devices charged while you work – so they’re always ready to go.

4. Customisable 
Movable dividers allow you to customise compartments to suit your specific needs.

5. Time-Saving Storage 
With everything neatly organised in a shallow compartment, you’ll easily locate items in a glance, and know instantly if something is missing.

6. On The Go Access
Simply flip the lid open like a book to access your essentials on the go. The foam padded interior will keep your belongings safe and protected as you go about your daily commute.

 7. Storage For Cards and Loose Items 
Store cards you don’t use often in the lid to free up space in your wallet. Also included is an elastic pouch for smaller items that tend to go astray. 

8. Convenient Pen Access 
The pen loop on the exterior ensures you always have easy access to a pen when you need it. 
 1. Dual-Function Hinge Mechanism 
Lift the lid or flip it open like a book to access the internal storage.
PLAY

PLAY


2. Adjusting Movable Dividers 
Easily setup or change your storage configuration by moving and placing down the velcro dividers.
PLAY


3. Drop Test
The secure elastic loop closure keeps Nest in one piece.
PLAY


4. Everything Stays In Place 
Items stored inside won’t move around. 
PLAY

1 x top tray (with embedded wireless charger)
1 x bottom tray
6 x movable dividers
1 x USB-C Cable

Orbitkey Nest compared with Macbook Pro 15"

We believe in clever organisation for better living. 
Since 2013, we've launched 3 Kickstarter campaigns, with 22,000 backers, raising over USD 1 million. 
We love Kickstarter. Not only did you help bring Orbitkey to life, you also allow us to focus on making great products and keep doing the things we love – without the influence of outside investors.
We are a team of 14 passionate individuals based in Melbourne, Australia – driven by design, innovation and the idea of better living. This new project is the result of continuous feedback and hard work for the past few years. We hope to have you join us on our journey towards better living.
We always try to be conscious of what we’re designing. To focus less on the quantity, and instead focus more on the quality of the small, but considered selection of products. Our hearts, minds and even weekends were poured into this new product, and here’s a small lookbook to give you an idea of how we went about designing Orbitkey Nest.
Apart from being a beautifully designed product, we’ve ensured that Orbitkey Nest is crafted from premium materials and will withstand everyday use. We’ve conducted rigorous testing that demonstrate the durability of Nest: 
External Fabric Abrasion Testing
Elastic Loop Durability Testing
Elastic Loop Abrasion Testing
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a product to life. However, this will be Orbitkey’s 4th Kickstarter campaign, and the previous campaigns have given us valuable experience in all aspects of bringing a product to life and running a crowdfunding campaign. 

It has better prepared us in the challenges associated with tooling, production, logistics, communication and delivering a high-quality product.

In the case of encountering unavoidable obstacles, we have always handled them swiftly and efficiently, and have always conducted things in the best interest of our backers and Orbitkey family. We always keep our backers updated and with complete transparency.

We will do our very best to ensure we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile whenever possible. Thanks for believing in us!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
We've made a commitment that everything we do and build needs to add value toward helping our community live better lives. If they don’t, we should rethink why we’re doing it, and work out a better approach. They are designed with the best materials and built to last – and tested thoroughly to withstand heavy use. We love that we're still seeing plenty of backers from our first Kickstarter campaign in 2013 still using the rewards they received on Kickstarter.
Reusability and recyclability
Our products are designed to last. However, should you encounter any problems with any of the parts, you can let us know and we'll be able to send you a specific replacement part. For example, the in-built wireless charging pad compartment can be accessed using a small sharp object in the case of it breaking. 

On top of this, all our packaging material is plastic-free and 100% recyclable.
Environmentally friendly factories
All our factories have been carefully selected and are partners we've been working with for several years. We have team members on the ground who visit the factories on a regular basis to ensure quality, ethical and environmental standards are upheld.
Sustainable Distribution
We plan to optimise our shipping routes by utilising sea-freight of bulk quantities to local warehouses and to reduce the carbon footprint of our delivery plan.
Something else
Like Kickstarter, we've already committed to offset our carbon footprint in 2020 to zero. We've also signed up to become Climate Neutral certified.

campaign.story:
See how other people feel about TripPal
PLAY

What's a good travel pillow?
The Ultimate Travel Pillow with Soft and All-rounded Neck Support 
Sick and tired of your soft memory foam travel pillow that barely does the job?    
Downsides of Old-School Travel Pillow
Poorly Engineered
Too Soft 
Hot and Irritating 
 Why we designed the TripPal travel pillow 
First Travel Pillow Designed with Cervical Spondylosis in Mind
My name is Joshua, founder of TripPal, I'm a frequent traveller, and I suffer from cervical spondylosis - a type of arthritis in my neck. I'd been searching for the best travel pillow - one that could really support my neck since long haul flights are a nightmare.
Unfortunately, nothing I found worked well.
So, I decided to design a neck pillow for myself - a state-of-the-art travel pillow that HELPS YOU TO SLEEP JUST LIKE AT HOME while you're in the air, in a car, riding a train, or just on your lunch break.
The Design
360-degree solid neck support, sleep just like at home
Youtube Review
 How to measure your neck's size 
Get a string or measuring tape
Wrap it around your neck and mark the joining end
Note the length and refer to our size chart
The Process
About the team
campaign.risks:

Timing is always a challenge with the production of a new product.
However, we are working with top-notch suppliers and we have padded our timeline to make sure we can hit the time frames we have laid out.

Also our QA team is in place to personally check every shipment that will go out to make sure all backers receive the product without any defaults.

The challenge therefore will not be the production side, but mostly the fulfillment side. We now have a good margin in our delivery times, and hope to deliver all the pillows even before the deadline mentioned on this page.

updates.update_userinfo: We need extra info from Brazil & India backers
updates.update_content:
Hey Brazil & India backers,

Please respond to us ASAP. We need this extra info to send out your rewards.

Brazil backers please click the link below and provide us your CPF info:
https://forms.gle/z7aVByfBVh3dkB429

Dear backers,
Thank you for all the comments and messages about our program in Kickstarters. Our team is making progress in shipping all the TripPal Pillows to all over the world. 
Fortunately, we successfully sent TripPals to most of the backers. 
Since the epidemic has delayed everyone for a long time, we are also feeling guilty. So we decided to give a re-shipment to the backer who did not receive the TripPal pillow. I hope this solution can compensate the backers who have received any.

Congratulations to the 4432 Backers! 
We triumphantly possess reached the final shipment of about 173 TripPal. Most of the backers have got our TripPal, which others are on their way. It has reached the final stage of our shipment. Thank you for your patience and kindness for us during this challenging moment.

Dear all TripPal backers:
We are all aware of the ongoing outbreak of the Coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19), which was recently declared a pandemic by the World Health Organization, and the President and Governor have declared a national and state emergency, respectively. Although the situation continues to evolve rapidly, TripPal Team remains fully committed to pursuing the completion of our work in a safe, diligent, and reasonable manner under the current circumstances. We must recognize, however, there is a strong likelihood that we will encounter inevitable delays as a result of this pandemic.

Dear TripPal backers,
Here's an update about April shipment, we our best effort to deliver all the Trippal pillow to you now The COVID-19 outbreak is something we can’t predict, it suspends our shipping schedule.
According to our logistics company feedback, only a few of international flights are not canceled. On account of the aircraft that are now occurring used to transport COVID-19 medical supplies though our delivering team are strives to provide other express methods. We have no choice but to put off a shipment in April. Please accept our apologies, particularly for backers who can’t wait to test and try out their TripPal.

updates.update_userinfo: We have sent out the first batch of rewards!
updates.update_content:
Hello Trippal Pillow backers
We sincerely apologize for the delayed shipping. We really wish we could have started delivering sooner. 
Chinese New Year began Saturday, January 25th, 2020. Typically, our manufacturing partners’ offices and factories close for about three working weeks, allowing workers time to travel back home to spend the holiday with their families. The half materials are in the stock, our factories are firing up again, but many workers are short supply, the production is limited.

Hello TripPal pillow backers,
Thanks for your patience and continued support. The surveys have been sent. Please check the inbox of the email which is connected to your Kickstarter account and fill in your shipping information and pillow size.
The survey is the key to us being able to prepare your reward package, you can fill the survey out here —>https://trippal.backerkit.com/sign_in

Hello TripPal backers
It's been another week! What is the TripPal team doing for now? Well, our team is following mass production to make sure your TripPal is well-produced! And of course, the mass production schedule goes well. We'd like to share some images with you.

campaign.story:
The Draft Top 2.0
 “Drinking Topless Since ‘12” 
PLAY

 Production sample in action
As seen on:
Want to help us spread the word and make a little something for yourself? Click the image below:
What is The Draft Top tool?
Explosion not guaranteed
The Draft Top tool is a patent pending bar tool designed to remove the top of almost any can.  
The result is a topless can that enhances your drinking experience and allows you to do things with the can that you never thought you could.
 Not to mention the innovative design safely removes the top leaving no sharp edges. 
The Draft Top can be used on most 8-19 oz beverage cans. 
Are you a beer drinker? 
Good news, the Draft Top tool works on Domestic, Imported, and Craft Beers
Don’t drink beer, no problem!
 The Draft Top tool also works on Spiked Seltzers, Canned Wine, Canned Cocktails, Energy Drinks, Iced Coffee, Soda/Seltzer, and much more.
Why Drink Topless?
There are many reasons why you should Drink Topless, but here are just a few.
 A smooth pour
Removing the top allows for an uninterrupted pour. Leaving you less full and ready to grab another. Ditch the glass and drink straight from the can.
Imagine the mugs as your stomach....
Enjoy the full taste 
By removing the entire top, the Draft Top tool allows your nose to enjoy the aroma of your beverage instead of the aluminum top. Enhancing the flavor and allowing you to enjoy it as if it were a glass.
You have to be classy when drinking wine in a can
Garnish your drinks
Spicing up your favorite canned drinks is even easier when you Drink Topless. Whether you like cocktails or just a little citrus in your beer, we've got you un-covered.
Send It
 By opening the entire top, the Draft Top tool allows you to drink from the can even faster. Great for showing off your skills to your friends or for das bootsrennen.
Be like Jesse and Drink Topless
Getting Creative
 Topless cans are perfect for those right-brained individuals who want to get their craft on.
They are also perfect for those who just want to play drinking games such as beer pong or beer die.
Ping pong balls sold separately
This was not our first try...
How to Use the Draft Top
Drinking Topless only takes 4 simple steps.
1. Grab top edge of can
Or bottom edge of can
Don't grab the center of the can! 
2. Open Handle and place tool on the top of the can
3. Squeeze handle and rotate
4. Align rim with handle notches and slowly rock to open the top

How Does it Work?
 When the handle is squeezed, it forces the center gear to rotate causing each of the four splitters to synchronously extend towards the rim of the can allowing the Draft Top tool to open a variety of can sizes. 
Watch the Draft Top bar tool opening different sized cans (CAD model shown)
Durable Design
The tool is made of high impact ABS plastic allowing it to withstand the wear and tear of every day life such as:
A night in a cooler
An accidental encounter with your car... We're just trying to prove a point, there's no need to celebrate it Frank!
Engineered for Performance
The splitters are designed to be safe to the touch and last for hundreds of cans and likely more.
Small enough to take on the go
The Draft Top is about the size of most smartphones and can easily fit into your pocket.
The Draft Top tool is smaller than your average smartphone
Simply click the handle closed for safe storage and slip it into your pocket to take it anywhere.
Interested in Co-Branding?
We have designed the Draft Top tool to be easily customized to help promote your brand.  Just give us your logo and pick  your colors.
CAD models shown
Co-branding is not available during Kickstarter, please contact us at hello@drafttop.com for more information.

How did we get here?
Proudly American Made
It was very important for us to keep manufacturing here in the States. Not only does it help speed up delivery times and improve quality for our customers, but it allows us to utilize a network of talented manufacturers across the country. We are very pleased with the quality and support we have received from our vendors and look forward to working with them for future orders and products!
One of the injection molding machines in our manufacturer's facility
Production Has Begun
From design to prototyping, tooling to production, the Draft Top tool has already started its journey from idea to reality. Take a look at what we've been up to.
PLAY

One of the Draft Top tool's molds being manufactured
PLAY

 Production parts being made in an injection molding machine
Draft Top tools in their packaging
Hell or High Water - We're Making this Product
As you can see we have already initiated production for this product, so it’s not a question of “IF” you will be rewarded with the product but “WHEN”. We have proven to deliver on our promise in the past and fully intend to do it again.
                Thank you for your support because without you we wouldn’t be here!!! 
Drink Topless 
The Draft Top team

FAQ's
 Why would I want this? Instead of smashing your nose against the aluminum top, you can smell the aroma of your drink. Not to mention a smooth pour and no clugging which makes you feel full. Or just Send It. 
 When will this be delivered? We are anticipating early 2020. 
 Do you ship overseas? Yes. Separate shipping rates apply.
 Can you get different colors? There will be additional color options in the future. Sign up for details or contact us at hello@drafttop.com 
 Are you able to put another logo on the Draft Top? Yes, but not during Kickstarter. Minimum orders apply. Reach out to us at hello@drafttop.com for more details
 Does it leave a sharp edge? No, the cut occurs inside the rim of the can and folds the aluminum into the rim.  
 Are the blades sharp? No, in fact they are purposefully dull. We call them splitters. Technically they are splitting the metal and not cutting it.
 Will the splitters rust? If left in water for a few days or covered in soda or beer there is a likelihood that they will develop surface rust. They are made of 300 series stainless.  
 Can it be washed/is it dishwasher safe? We don't recommend using it in the dishwasher as it could affect longevity of the tool. We recommend just rinsing it using warm water after each session. 
 How long will it last? We've tested samples on hundreds of cans and have prototypes that are still being used well above 1,000 cans 
 Does it grab the top? No. If the top falls completely in, you have to flip it on its side and pull it out. If it partially cuts the lid, you can use the tool to fold it into the can like the tab normally folds in. 
 So the top just falls in the can? Sometimes. It all depends on how the tool is used. If it partially cuts the lid, you can use the tool to fold it into the can like the tab normally folds in. 
 Isn't the top dirty? Maybe but its the same top that you put your lips on when drinking from the can the normal way. So just Drink Topless! Its a lot better.  
 Does it work on Tall boys? Yes, most 16oz to 19oz cans. It does not work on most 24oz cans or the Fosters Oil Can
 Does it work on crowlers? No - those are good for a nice set of glasses
 How does it work? When holding the tool in either hand, the top right corner has a part of the handle that sticks out. When you push this in the handle opens and retracts the splitters to the center. With the opposite hand holding the can near the top or bottom near the bends, you place the tool on the can and slowly squeeze while starting to rotate. The four splitters move outward from the center when you squeeze the handle. They puncture the inside rim of the can just below the top and split the aluminum open as you rotate the tool. A minimum of a quarter twist is needed to fully remove the top but sometimes it take a half or full twist. Below the handle are grooves designed to allow you to rest them on the rim and push the lid in. Remember, the objective is to open the top not take the lid out.   
 Do you or will you sell replacement parts? Not at this time. 
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 950+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $400M raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
While there is always a potential for unknown’s to occur, the only challenge we can foresee at this time is uncertainty of delivery times based on the volume of orders. In order to afford the tooling ahead of Kickstarter we choose to go with single cavity mold which limits the rate of production. Our manufacturer is capable of handling larger volumes, but the delivery times will likely be delayed. The product will be fulfilled on a first come first serve basis so later backers will have to wait a little longer to receive their reward.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Can I customize my box? You sure can! We fully appreciate that not every Aussie household uses all 10 of the products we’ve developed. Some people don’t have a dishwasher. Other people don’t like using bodywash...Don’t sweat, we’ve got you covered. If there’s an item(s) in the “Starter Box” that you don’t want, or don’t use, you can swap it out for another item(s) of similar value – for example, if you don’t want bodywash you can swap it for an extra handwash etc. At the conclusion of our Kickstarter campaign we’ll email you to confirm exactly what items you want in your “Starter Box”. Read the FAQs for more details.
Can I just order the refills and use my own dispensers?  Yes you can! At the conclusion of our Kickstarter campaign we’ll email you to confirm exactly what items you want in your “Starter Box”. Read the FAQs for more details.
How long will the “Starter Box” last?  The volume of each individual product inside our “Starter Box” has been specifically created so that most products will run out at about the same time. We’ve done this to make things easier for you when it comes to purchasing refills. Based on our research, our “Starter Box” will last the average family of 4 approx. 2-3 months. Read the FAQs for more details.
What happens when I run out?  When your dispensers start to run low, simply jump onto our website and order some refills. You can order any product, in any quantity, delivered direct to your door (carbon neutral), anytime. It’s really simple. There’s no lock in contracts, no minimum orders, no subscriptions, no BS. 
Every time you re-order, we’ll send you a postage-paid return envelope so you can return your empty sachets from your current order and any previous orders all at the same time. Read the FAQs for more details.
Where do you deliver:  We deliver (carbon neutral) Australia wide. Once we’re up and running, we’ll aim to deliver direct to your door within 3-5 business days. Read the FAQs for more details.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We've been working our little butts-off trying to solve the plastic problem. Over the past 12mths we've drilled down all the way into the nitty-gritty details to build a comprehensive plan to launch Zero Co. But no matter how much planning we've done, the reality is that this is a start-up. There are risks and challenges that lie ahead. Here are some of the key ones we've identified:

1. Maybe you won't like our products:
Don't sweat, we've got you covered with our 100% 30-day money back guarantee. That means if you're not 100% satisfied with our products, send them back to us within 30 days and we'll refund your hard earned cash.

2. What happens if we don't hit our fundraising target?
Kickstarter is an all or nothing funding platform. That means if we don't hit our funding target, all money is refunded to supporters. It's essentially another money-back guarantee.

3. What happens if there are problems with our manufacturing process?
We're working with one of Australia's largest contract manufacturers of environmentally-friendly products. They currently manufacture for A LOT of big-name supermarket brands and have confirmed that they have capacity to deliver our products on time and on budget.

4. Do we have the experience to pull-off a project as big as this?
Zero Co founder Mike Smith has been building start-ups for the past 10yrs+. He has successfully scaled a number of businesses. The senior management supporting Mike at Zero Co have extensive experience in their respective fields. The investment team and board are world-class entrepreneurs, business people and investors with decades of experience at the highest levels of business. Together this diverse group of professionals have outstanding credentials to deliver a project like Zero Co.

5. What's to stop us running away to the Caribbean with all your money?
Zero Co founder Mike Smith has invested most of his life savings into this project. He's not getting a cent of that money back until the company starts to turn a profit. He's got at least 100,000 reasons not to disappear to the Caribbean.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: October Status Update: WE ARE STARTING TO SHIP YOUR ORDERS!
updates.update_content: NOTE: THIS UPDATE WAS ALSO SENT DIRECTLY TO BACKERS VIA EMAIL OCTOBER 19.

Hello everyone!
Can you believe another month has gone by and it's already time for another warts and all Zero Co status update? Seems to come around so quickly (unlike freedom for the unlucky Melbournians in lockdown...fingers crossed it won't be much longer!).
We're officially on the homestretch now...here's the latest on the ground here at HQ:
THE BOTTLES & POUCHES ARE ON A BOAT!

Hi everyone
Welcome to the July edition of The Trash Times, aka The Garbage Gazette, aka The Plastic Post aka our monthly warts and all project update.
This is an absolute BUMPER edition with STACKS of juicy updates. So let's jump straight in...
WE'RE HIRING (TWICE)!

Hi there
I'm reaching out to give you another of my warts-and-all project updates.  This one is a special mid-year bumper edition, packed with lots of exciting juicy updates!
Since last month's project update, we've been working intensely with our packaging suppliers to get some more certainty around production timelines after COVID-19 threw some serious curve-balls into our schedule (I won't bore you with the details but I've certainly lost some more hair recently!).

Hey everyone
Just touching base to give you another warts and all status update for the month of May!
As you know, COVID-19 has thrown a few spanners in the works in terms of our production and delivery timelines (if you missed that, the details are over here). Just to recap, below is a list of all the project milestones we need to tick off to get our do-goodies delivered to you...

Hey everyone
It's been a crazy few weeks for the world to say the least.
Supermarket shelves are empty. International travel has ground to a halt. Businesses have closed their doors and let staff go.
The speed with which COVID-19 has swept across the planet has been breathtaking.

updates.update_userinfo: Exciting News From Zero Co HQ!
updates.update_content:
Morning Planetary Legends!
It's been an action packed few weeks over here at Zero Co HQ since we wrapped up Australia's most funded Kickstarter project of 2019.
We've been heads-down, bums-up, working hard to turn this idea into a reality. We take the trust that you have placed in us VERY seriously and we're 11890% focused on building a world-changing business with (and for) you.

Wow.  What an epic few weeks it's been...we're ecstatic, exhausted, exhilarated and a little fearful all at once!!!
On behalf of the three musketeers (Kate, Alyssa and myself) thank you all SO MUCH for all your support, kind words of encouragement and most importantly financial contribution to our ambitious project.  
Thanks to your support Zero Co is now the most funded Australian Kickstarter campaign of 2019 and the most funded Australian Kickstarter (selling exclusively to the Australian market) of all time.  It blows me away to be writing that.

project_data.project_name: Zero Co: Win the war-on-waste at your place.

campaign.story:
Love your iPad even more. 
The first iPad screen protector to make drawing and writing feel like paper. 
Now even better.
You probably like your iPad very much. It's an amazing device for note taking, drawing or just binging on Netflix. But one thing always bugged us: writing on it feels kind of like plastic on glass. It's awkward, tiring and the result is usually sloppy.
That's why, two years ago, we developed the original Paperlike screen protector and Kickstarter helped us make it come to life.
Since then over 10.000 digital Artists, Sketchers, Notetakers and Business Professionals, all around the world, used their Paperlike constantly. 
And they had feedback. 
And we listened.
One thing came up again and again: The paper feel is great, the precision is great but the quality of the screen became too grainy. There was too much refraction going on.
So we went back to the drawing board, tinkered and experimented and today, we're super proud to present to you ...

The new Paperlike with Nanodots® Surface Technology
More paper-feel, less display noise.
The key ingredient for the new Paperlike is the new Surface Technology "Nanodots®". We called it that for a very simple reason: because we've basically sprinkled tiny dots across the screen protector's foil. These dots don't disturb the light as much, thus you get a rougher screen with less refraction.
Paperlike® Nanodots® in action
The Paperlike is made for Artists, for Notetakers, for Creatives. It's made for Makers and Doers like you.

Draw
Artists all around the world love the Paperlike for the improved precision and tactile feel. We optimized the ideal amount of friction for long drawing sessions and the right stroke resistance for optimal accuracy. 
 Write
The iPad is an amazing device for taking notes and for going paperless. But something's not quite right. The slippery feel of the plastic pencil tip on glass makes writing imprecise and tiring. 
The Paperlike helps you combine all the advantages of a digital device while keeping the nice tactile feel of paper. 
Make sure you're ready for endless meeting notes or the scribble for your next big idea!
Enjoy
After you're done with all that making and doing, you might want to enjoy your iPad in a say "less productive way". Since the new Paperlike is made for superior display quality, nothing stands in the way of you and some relaxing hours of Netflix or Youtube. And you know what's best? The matte and glare resistant finish of the Paperlike even allows you to enjoy your screen time sitting in the sun. (Please apply sun screen where necessary, the Paperlike does not fix that. Yet.)
About us
Today, Paperlike is more than just Jan. He still has his fingers in every aspect of it, but we have an amazing team to support him and make all of this possible.
So, what are you waiting for? Back us on Kickstarter and help make the new Paperlike® with Nanodots® technology come to life!
Love your iPad even more.



-----
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Manufacturing and quality control: 
We're working with an experienced manufacturer for the Paperlike 2, and they have consistently manufactured our prototypes with the right surface condition and material. We don't expect any risk there.

Distribution:
The complexity of the distribution depends strongly on how successful this campaign becomes. Jan has experience in managing Kickstarter campaigns, and this hasn't been an issue yet. Also we've been working on Paperlike since 2017 and have built processes so that each ordered Paperlike reaches its destination, no matter where in the world.

Unforeseeables: 
If you are a regular Kickstarter user, you will know the risks that we face when launching a crowdfunding project. The most common one is dealing with unforeseeable situations and unforeseeable problems. Which we can’t list here due to the mere nature of these and the vast amount of improbable things that might happen and the ones that will end up happening. Herewith we pledge that we will tackle any problem with our best energy and competence. We have a team of experienced problem-solvers who will get this project through any hiccup, and you'll take part in this adventure by receiving regular updates.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
* STRETCH GOAL REACHED: We've expanded the book to 350 pages * 
In the summer of 1999, a small group of friends set out to create a paintball magazine that, for the first time ever, would focus exclusively on tournament paintball. We called the magazine P8NT.
What we didn't know at the time was that paintball was about to enter a period of massive growth that would transform every aspect of the industry. 
In just a few short years we saw tournaments move out of the woods and onto airball fields, an explosion of new companies and equipment, the introduction of electronic guns, the war between the leagues and the creation of X-Ball, the quest to bring paintball to television and the emergence of high-paid, superstar players. Paintball would never be the same.    
This was an era when participation in the sport was exploding, and mainstream acceptance seemed to be just around the corner. For the first time, paintball would have to grapple with the possibility of corporate sponsors, television deals, six-figure contracts for professional players and a competitive environment that was like nothing anyone had seen before. 
2004 Tampa National Professional Paintball League event
The final issue of P8NT Magazine was published in 2004, at the height of this era. Since then, thousands of photos and hundreds of hours of interviews have sat untouched in storage.
Now, exactly 20 years after its debut, the original team behind P8NT is reuniting to tell the story of one of the most exciting and important periods in the history of paintball, in a format that's never been seen before. 
F8MOUS is a limited edition, 350 page hardcover photo book collecting hundreds of photos, stories and interviews from one of the most revolutionary eras of tournament paintball. This is the story of how the passion and drive of a handful of players and industry leaders transformed paintball—and what was gained, and lost, as a result.
This is an unfiltered, inside look at how a game became a sport.
This project is a labor of love for everyone involved, and we're turning to the paintball community to help bring it to life. F8MOUS is your opportunity to own a piece of paintball history—but it's also a chance to help make history. 
Chris Lasoya, playing for Team USA at the Nation's Cup inaugural X-Ball exhibition event (2002)
ADDITIONAL REWARDS
Every level of support includes a copy of F8MOUS. But for those who are able to go above and beyond to help bring this book to life, we've put together a series of exclusive rewards. 
We're offering the basic book at a break-even price, in order to make it available to as many people as possible. At the supporter level and beyond, we'll include your name in a special section of the book as one of the people who made it possible.   
All of the photos in F8MOUS were shot on film, giving it a unique look and feel. As part of the original photo process, 8" x 10" contact sheets were produced for every roll of black and white film (color photos were primarily shot on slides). (LIMITED TO 50) 
We've hand-selected 50 of these original contacts sheets from 1999 to 2004 and are making them available as a special, limited reward. Each sheet is printed on glossy photo paper and displays a full roll of film (approximately 36 images each) exactly as they were shot, complete with original grease-pencil notations from the photographer. 
This is your chance to own a large, 11" by 17" giclee print of a photo by one of the original P8NT Magazine photographers. You can choose any one of the hundreds of photos in the book. These are high-quality, archival prints suitable for framing, and each one will be specially packaged and shipped flat. If you have a question about which photos are available, email paintballfamous@gmail.com and we'll let you know if we have what you're looking for.    
(Just a few of the hundreds of photos you can choose from)
"These guys took it to a level that was hugely brave. Their design language didn’t just move things on a bit, it showed everyone what can be achieved with great creative input ... Bravo. Take my money. I want my book." –Al Woods, Planet Eclipse
"This magazine changed my life. I read every issue front to back 100 times. It motivated me to become pro, pursue travel—and now is part of the inspiration for the Iron City Classic." –Tim Montressor
"P8NT had an uncanny way of telling an entire story through a single image that literally made you feel like you were actually living that very moment of time without reading a single word. To this date, I have never come across this level of artistry within any other sport." –(Dirty) Dave Pastore
"Ask those that where there, and they will tell you that P8NT defined an era in paintball history that we all hold dear." –Jack Wood, Planet Eclipse
"If you are a fan of the sport, you should pitch in and help these guys get this off the ground. New school or old school. Doesn’t matter. If you’re old school, you know these guys rock and they’re trying to give credit to those of us who helped bring this thing to life. If you’re new school, you ought to respect and appreciate what got this sport to where it was when you found it." –Lane Wright
For the duration of this Kickstarter campaign, we'll be posting regular updates on Instagram at @paintballf8mous and on Facebook at facebook.com/paintballf8mous. Follow along to get a look at some of the iconic photos that will be included in the book, as well as outtakes, work in progress, and some special surprises from the archives. 
Q: So, is this P8NT Magazine?
A: Nope. But it is being made by many of the people who were involved in P8NT, including editor & publisher Christopher Hass, photo editor Chris Dilts, and designer and photographer Dan Mouradian. Dan Napoli, Matt Marshall, Sara Duckwall and Aaron Moore are also part of the team, and all of the photographers whose work will be included have given permission to include their photos in the book. If you were a fan of P8NT, you'll want a copy of F8MOUS. But even if you've never heard of P8NT, if you care about tournament paintball this is one you won't want to miss.
Q: What exactly will be in the book?
A: A whole lot of stuff: Hundreds of photos, many of which have never been seen before, as well as stories and interviews conducted from 1999 to 2004, many of which have never been published before. Together, they tell the story of the creation of the modern pro paintball scene.
Q: When will I get my copy of the book?
A: Work on the book has already begun, and if we're able to hit our funding goal we hope to have it completed by the end of the year. Everyone who orders a copy will have access to regular updates on the progress of the project, as well as behind-the-scenes looks of the book as it comes together.
Q: Will the book be available outside of Kickstarter?
A: Currently there are no plans to distribute the book beyond this limited edition run, so the only way to guarantee you'll get one is to order through the Kickstarter campaign. You have until August 29 to reserve a copy. 
Q: Where does the money go?
A: This project is a labor of love for everyone involved, and all of us are volunteering our time. We want to produce the best possible book, and all of the money raised will be put back into the project. Here's a breakdown of how we plan to use the money:
Printing & production:            58%
Shipping:                                    15%
Photography services:            11%
Equipment costs:                       5%
Video production:                      3%
Kickstarter fees:                         5%
Credit card processing fees:   3%
TOTAL:                                           100%*
*(based on a $40,000 budget)
If you still have questions, or if you just want to drop us a line and let us know what you think about the book, you can email us at paintballf8mous@gmail.com.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We're a small team working on a shoestring budget, with no giant marketing plan. But we want to make sure that this book is the best possible representation of a time and a scene that deserves to be documented. In order to succeed, we're counting on players and fans to help get the word out—to both the players who lived this era, as well as the new generation of players who are still pushing the boundaries of the sport today.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Nobody likes bad news (least of all us), but we wanted to give everyone an update on shipping and where we're at.
After one final, short delay of 48 hours, the shipping container with all 2,000 books arrived at a Chicagoland train yard on May 26. We contracted a trucking company to get the books across the final leg, to the small office where we'll be packing and shipping orders. The office is all cleaned up and ready to go, with stacks of empty boxes just waiting for the books to arrive.

First, the most important news: All 2,000 books have cleared customs and are on the way to Chicago now. The books should be here by the end of the week, which means we’ll be able to begin shipping them to backers by June 1.
In order to make sure everything runs smoothly, we have a few final pieces of housekeeping:
Make sure we have your correct address:
We’ve updated the shipping address for everyone who has reached out to us so far, but if you’ve moved since you placed your order and haven’t sent us a message yet, now’s your last chance. Email with your new address and we'll update your order.

updates.update_userinfo: The first look at the finished book, and (finally) a shipping update
updates.update_content: After a few additional nerve-racking weeks of wait, we finally received the first 5 advance copies of F8MOUS:
A few days ago, we signed off on the final printer proofs for F8MOUS.

F8MOUS reached a big milestone today: 100% of the content is now complete. Everything has been written, designed, copy-edited, proofed, polished, reviewed and re-reviewed. Here's a look at the aftermath:

We know it's been a while since the last update, but we've been heads down finishing up the book and are in the final stretch now. We'll keep this one brief. 
We've edited down hundreds of pages across multiple drafts, and at this point all that's left is final copy edits, fact-checking and proofing -- as well as making sure every image is reproduced as perfectly as possible.

Like the rest of the paintball world, we were all shocked to learn that Tim Montressor had passed away suddenly last week. I knew Tim from my days practicing at Futureball in Michigan, more than a decade ago, but I hadn't spoken to him in years. He reached out to me last year, shortly after we announced this project, to let us know how excited he was about it. I told him then that F8MOUS likely wouldn't exist if it weren't for him.
Myself, Chris Dilts and Dan Mouradian had talked about a project like this off and on for years, but what finally flipped the switch and convinced me to move forward with it was watching the webcast of the 2018 Iron City Classic. Part of it was seeing all the old faces I didn't even realize how much I'd missed, but more than anything it was seeing what Tim had built, and how he had built it, and the joy it had brought so many people.

updates.update_userinfo: Update on release date + 2 big announcements
updates.update_content:
Apologies to everyone for the recent radio silence—we’ve been heads down at work on the project for a while, but we wanted to take a quick break to give you an update on timing, as well as two big additions to the book.
The response to F8MOUS has been incredible, and it's grown into a bigger and more important project for all of us than we'd ever expected. It's also made us determined to produce a book that's worthy of your support.

campaign.story:
Nice things folks are saying:
Carryology- "...a compact package that clips onto your pocket for easy access on the go."
HiComsumption - "...an exceptionally-made tool built to remedy problems on-the-go."
New Atlas - (formerly Gizmag) - "...a new solution for handy folks after some versatility when tending to everyday tasks..."
The Coolector - "Fantastically functional and robust enough for everyday use, you’ll be  amazed with just how regularly you find yourself reaching for this  exemplary tool on a day to day basis."
________________
Hi Kickstarters,
We're glad to be back with our 28th project, let's jump right into some titanium goodness!
Introducing a new kind of pocket screwdriver
The Ti EDS : Not Your Average Screwdriver
This is a fully custom, CNC milled solid titanium screwdriver + 3 hex bits + 40mm articulated extension arm that features a time tested frame-lock mechanism + lifetime warranty. The tighter you grip it, the more secure it the mechanism gets. It's built from the ground up and is backed for life. If a high-end titanium knife and a compact screwdriver had a kid, this would be it. 
Ti EDS
The Backstory
In 2017, we created the Bit Bar to provide a way for people to comfortably EDC (everyday carry) a screwdriver and extra bits. Today, we are excited to show you our newest addition to the series that we call the Ti EDS. It's a more streamlined version of the original that has a few new tricks up it's sleeves.
360º Spin View
Why Carry A Screwdriver? 
It's amazing how many times a day we need a screwdriver and various bits (i.e. door hinges, hose clamp, kid toys, camera gear, honey-can-you-fix-that, etc.) but don't want to run back to our tool box for these trivial/small tasks. Somedays we like to keep a low-pocket profile so the original Bit Bar tends to stay in a drawer those days.  So, designing a more streamlined version with a built-in extension arm is what we wanted to tackle next. It's been the perfect size to get things done and yet not take over our pockets. 
4 Side Views
Unique Features
Bringing all of these details below together is what make it special.
Solid Grade 5 Titanium
Secure Frame-Lock Mechanism
Built-In 40mm Actuating Extension Arm
Pocket Clip/Lanyard/Keyring Friendly
Rare-Earth Magnets (to keep everything tidy)
Extra 2 Bit Storage Tray (w/spring loaded ball bearing)
100% Metal Construction (no plastic parts) 
Solid Grade 5 Titanium 40mm Extension Arm
Every single millimeter, chamfered edge, and tiny detail has been designed, re-designed and refined until we were happy with how it felt and functioned. 
The extension arm rotates 180º and locks securely in the center of the tool.
Countless Daily Uses
Visual Size Comparisons 
Visual size comparisons (Left to right) : Ti EDC Wrench, KeyBar®, Ti EDS, Bit Bar, TPT Slide
Secure Grip & Mechanism  
The tighter you grip it, the more secure the frame lock gets.
No Proprietary Bits, Use The Bits You Already Own
We know you already own a bazillion standard 1/4" hex bits and that your perfect 3 bits to EDC are different from ours. So feel free to swap them out/customize the 3 hex bits with the ones you own and build your ultimate pocket screwdriver.
Magnetic slotted tray for storing 2 extra bits. (accepts standard 1/4" hex bits)
A spring-loaded ball bearing provides quick access and keeps your bits in place when stored.
Easy Open/Close
Quick one-handed operation is key and the Ti EDS screwdriver intuitively opens and closes like a pocket knife. 
It quickly opens & closes, just like a frame-lock style knife.
What's Included? 
Ti EDS Screwdriver (Stonewashed finish only)
3 Hex Bits (S2 steel, standard 1/4"bits)
Lifetime Service Warranty
Included: Ti EDS Screwdriver + 1/4" Flathead Bit + #2 Phillips Bit + T8 Torx Bit (Pivot Screw Size)
Specifications
Ti EDS Specs & Weights
Lifetime Service Warranty
Simply said, if it breaks we'll repair it for you.
If you've been burned other companies in the past, let us assure you that's not gonna happen here. No red-tape, no corporate run-arounds, just good ol' fashion service.
So, does that mean you can smash it with a hammer/abuse it and get a new one for free?
Nope, but it does mean that if you have an issue under a normal-use situation that you think needs to be fixed/repaired you can simply shoot us an email, mail it back to us, and we'll help fix your screwdriver ASAP.
Here's a link to our lifetime service & warranty page.
Timeline
Mid-July thru Mid-August - KS funding period
End of August - KS releases funds
September thru November - Production & QC
December & January - Assembly, Packing, & Fulfillment

Why Kickstarter?
Our company (Big Idea Design LLC) started back in 2011 after our very first Kickstarter project. So, to us it simply feels like home. We don't have (or want) any investors so we bring our new products to the Kickstarter community. We simply love being an active part of this community and making unique products with our backers that are built to last.
Chadwick & Joe - (Big Idea Design, LLC)
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our 28th kickstarter project so we are very comfortable knowing what it will take to bring this project to a successful completion. The only risk we foresee would be shipping a little bit later than the estimated dates show if the project is extremely over-funded. We have planned in extra time but if a production or shipping delay happens, we will let update everyone know about it ASAP through a project update. The pocket tools shown are also functional prototypes and the minor design elements or dimensions may need to be slightly adjusted during mass production to ensure we produce the best pocket tools that we can for everyone.

Safety/Liability Disclaimer: This is a tool and not a toy, so it should never be in the reach or possession of any children or minors. Tools have the potential to be very dangerous and we do not accept any responsibility whatsoever for any harm, damage, illegal activity, injury, etc. while using this tool. Simply said, please be safe folks.

All brands, websites, logos, and trademarks displayed on this project are used for demonstration purposes only and are sole property of each respected company and owner. No endorsement or ownership implied.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
