All containers around the world have cleared customs and all Kickstarter units will have been dispatched after today, so everyone will start receiving them any day now, if they haven't already.  
A big THANK YOU goes out to you all for your support and for being so patient. 
We will be adding some Links to our website over the next few weeks so you will be able to let your family and friends know where to get them from, no doubt many will be asking where you got them from and we have had requests from people asking if they can get a standard King as they don't want to use their First Edition as it is very collectible. https://www.kindlingcracker.com/pages/buynow Kind regards Ayla and the Team

Hi Everyone,  
We have encountered a two week delay due to the recent Cyclone that ripped through Australia and our hearts go out to all those that were affected by it, we have another Cyclone on its way to New Zealand right now and we sure don't need any more rain.
But the Kings are wrapped, packed and on the water/or about to be on the water.

Hi Everyone, 
We have just received the funds from Kickstarter and are so excited that we will be sending out your rewards soon!  
Thank you to everyone who has sent through their delivery details, there are a few backers who have yet to complete this, please double check that you have entered your shipping address and that it is correct.

updates.update_userinfo: Not long now and they will be shipped to every corner of the globe
updates.update_content: It was a huge week visiting the foundry and checking up on the production of the Kindling Cracker Kings. We took a few snapshots of them being dip painted and just before they dried black they went a green copper colour. They are now getting boxed and packed into the containers, not long now and they will be going to every corner of the globe.

updates.update_content:
Thank you all for your overwhelming support, our Kindling Cracker KING’s are getting made and your rewards will be on their way soon.  
We will keep you all updated with our progress on here. 
Kind regards 
Ayla and the Team at  www.kindlingcracker.com

All of the King boxes arrive in two weeks and we are full on into our major production run.  Stay tuned Ayla and her dad have just been testing out the new King.

campaign.story:
Introducing the Everyday Bags
Like all Peak Design products, our new bags are packed full of features and meticulously engineered. They are designed from the ground up to be both the best camera bags and the best everyday carry on the planet.
Skip ahead to: Backpack | Backpack Size | Tote | Sling | Range Pouch | Specs | FAQs
How to get them
Become a backer of this project and pick a reward. You will essentially be pre-ordering one of our new bags. You'll get a special backer discount, and you'll receive your stuff before it is available in stores. Want to buy more than one? Check outAll Rewards & Add-ons. Still confused? Check outHow to Back this Project.
We have no traditional investors. Instead, we launch products here on Kickstarter. The funds we raise here not only go towards manufacturing, they also help us design future products.
Are these camera bags?
Let's make one thing abundantly clear: these ain't just camera bags. They're Everyday bags—crafted by a team of designers, engineers, and photographers to meet the needs of everyone in the modern world. 
We may have cut our teeth in the camera accessories world, but these bags are for everyone, just like our (award-winning*) Everyday Messenger that we designed and launched a year ago with the help of renowned adventure photographer Trey Ratcliff. Peak Design Everyday Bags are unrivaled as camera bags and uncompromising as everyday companions.
Everyday Backpack
Simply put, a backpack without compromises. Available in Charcoal and Ash, and in 20L and 30L sizes. Unless otherwise specified, all pictures are of the 20L Everyday Backpack.
What makes the Everyday Backpack so stacked?
Find your size
Looking for detailed specs on size and laptop/tablet carry capacity? See our FAQ at the bottom of this page.
                                                                                                                                                                                 Everyday Tote
The classic tote bag, completely reimagined to protect, organize, and provide lightning-fast access to your camera gear and everyday carry (think beach, gym, traveling, diapers, etc). Available in Charcoal and Ash.
What makes the Everyday Tote so dope?
                                                                                                  Everyday Sling
The ultimate low-profile, quick-access day bag for light carry and daily excursions. Makes a great bag for beginning photographers or pros who just want to carry essentials. Also a fantastic option for the non-photographer who just wants a sleek everyday bag. Available in Charcoal and Ash.
What makes the Everyday Sling so bling? 
Range Pouch
The Range Pouch is specifically designed to protect and carry lenses on belts, straps, or in bags, available in three sizes. Like our Everyday Bags, the Range Pouch is intelligently designed, expandable, versatile, and feature-packed.
Why do we vouch for the Range Pouch?
                  Comparison and Specs
How to Back
1. Choose a reward level.
Everybody can choose one (and only one) reward level to back this project. You cannot choose 2 reward levels. Just one. You will get all items in that reward—you cannot swap things that you don't want for things that you do want. See the FAQ for why we can't do this.
2. If you want to add something, check out the Add-On Menu.
If (and only if) you want to add something additional to your reward, check out the Add-On Menu below. If it's in the Add-On Menu you can add it to your reward by increasing your pledge by the amount specified in the menu. You can only add things to your reward that are in the Add-On Menu.
If you want to add on a Peak Design product that you don't see in the Add-On Menu, don't worry. We'll give you a chance to do that after our campaign ends. See the FAQ for further explanation.
3. Relax, you're done for now.
All details like shipping information, color preference, and add-on specifics will be collected via survey after this campaign has ended.
Rewards and Add-Ons
1% For The Planet
This year we have the privilege of joining 1% For The Planet. In doing so, we pledge to donate 1% of our revenue (gross revenue, not just profit) to a group of certified environmental nonprofits.
Please note that per Kickstarter guidelines, we cannot use this crowdfunding project to raise funds for charity. We will certainly support our beneficiary orgs outside of Kickstarter, and celebrate this commitment with our backer community.
Thank you for your support!
We can't say it enough. Thank you for believing in us. We can't wait to get these new products in your hands.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is Peak Design's 6th Kickstarter project. We don't want to toot our own horn too vigorously (nobody likes an overly vigorous tooter) but we've got some great experience under our belts on how to manufacture high-quality goods and fulfill lots of orders for them. We've also been blindsided more than once by completely unexpected issues and always dealt with them in a way that leaves every last customer happy with their purchase and proud to support our company.

In short, we know what we're doing, and you should be very confident that we will deliver what we say we will, when we say we will. And we solemnly swear that should unforeseen issues come up, we will handle them with the utmost transparency and care for you, our backers.

Supply Chain Risk: We're incredibly proud of our supply chain, and have a lot of confidence that we can make what we say we'll make, when we say we'll make it. But know what? Sometimes 10 shipping containers of product get stuck outside a shipyard for 3 weeks. We pad our schedule for these kind of things, but sometimes not enough.

Acts of God: We're based in San Francisco. That means we could have an earthquake. Or we could have a massive spur-of-the-moment parade involving wacky costumes and public nudity. Or, god forbid, the Dodgers could come to town. Whatever happens, we'll get through it together. We promise.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Last Chance to Back Mobile, by Peak Design! Our 10th Kickstarter (and it'll only cost a dollar).
updates.update_content:
Hello Backers,
Joe here, from the PD Marketing squad. Hope you're enjoying your PD gear. I wanted to drop a quick reminder about our latest Project – Mobile, by Peak Design. You've got just a couple hours left to get in there and back Kickstarter #10 to lock in a pretty burly discount on the whole thing. And it'll only cost a buck to reserve your spot.

updates.update_userinfo: Brilliant everyday carry, now for your phone.
updates.update_content:
Howdy Everyday Backpack, Tote, and Sling backers,
A mere 10 days ago, we launched a brand new product line on Kickstarter: Mobile, by Peak Design. And if you're not the type to get hyped-up by phone cases and accessories, well, we think that's about to change.

updates.update_userinfo: There's a new Everyday Line in town. Introducing v2.
updates.update_content:
Ahoy Everyday Backpack, Tote, and Sling backers,
Nearly 5 years ago, our head designer (Art Viger, great guy, you'd love him) sewed the very first Everyday Messenger bag prototype. We launched that bag on Kickstarter in 2015, and in 2016 we followed it up with the Everyday Backpack, Tote, and Sling. It became our biggest Kickstarter campaign ever (at the time), and the Everyday Backpack soon became our most popular, iconic product. Today, it's hard to spend a day walking around an airport or a big city without seeing an Everyday Backpack.

Howdy Everyday Line Backers,
Typically when we post updates to past campaigns, we're sharing the latest Peak Design creation available on Kickstarter. Well, this too is a note informing you of a Kickstarter that just launched. Only this time, it's much bigger than Peak Design.

Kickstarter #9 is live, folks.
Moments ago, we hit the launch button on a funding campaign for the most compact, pro-level travel tripod ever made. We call it—wait for it—Travel Tripod.

updates.update_userinfo: 2 new duffels, and hours to go.
updates.update_content:
Dearest Everyday Line backers,
With just hours left in our 8th Kickstarter campaign we're proud to announce 2 beautiful new duffel bags into our Travel Line: the Travel Duffel 35L and the Travel Duffelpack 65L. If you've backed other Peak Design campaigns you might be getting this note a few times, and for that we apologize. We just want to give all of our backers a final chance to be a part of this wild shindig.
Ladies and gentlemen, Kickstarter number 8 has launched. Introducing the Travel Line.

updates.update_userinfo: The 2018 Peak Design Survey is here, and we'll pay you to take it.
updates.update_content:
We'll keep this short and sweet: it's time for you to tell us how we're doing, what we can do better, and what we should make next. In return, we'll send every survey respondent a special 15% off code for use at peakdesign.com. Let's party.
TAKE THE 2018 PEAK DESIGN CUSTOMER SURVEY
A few important footnotes: this is not a boring corporate survey. We hate those. Secondly, this once-a-year survey isn't the only time we accept feedback. We're always listening to what our backers, customers, and dealers tell us through many channels. The point of this survey is to help us understand high level trends across a broad spectrum of our customers. Finally, we think you're neat. That's all.

Heyo!
For awhile it was looking like we would go an entire calendar year without launching a Kickstarter project. But, you know us. We just had to keep the streak alive.
Say hello to the new Capture, Slide, and Slide Lite!

Well, well, well! It's been some time. Lotta things happening over here at the PD HQ...things that will come to fruition before the year is out.
But first, whatcha been up to? As we decorate our porches with ornamental gourds this fall, we wanted to share what we've been doing since the last time we talked:

campaign.story:
Why are sunglasses so expensive? We couldn’t find a good reason either. While looking for the answer, we did however find several problems with the sunglasses industry that we think really needed to be solved.
 • AFFORDABILITY: Not $300. Not $200. Not even $100. Our sunglasses are starting at just $35 on Kickstarter. By working direct to consumer, we pass the savings on to you with radical transparency.
 • PRACTICALITY: We wanted to create a quality handmade pair of sunglasses that’s built to last, but could be used for everyday wear.
• DESIGN: They’re beautifully crafted for timelessness with a less-is-more approach, resulting in a classic minimal look that will suit any style.
  We are a team of product designers, overseas importers, dreamers and marketers who came together on a mission to collectively use our skills to make a difference. Together we created Eye Gave, with the single goal of eliminating trachoma before 2020.
It's a simple idea: design a high-end pair of sunglasses, work directly with the factory so we can sell them at a reasonable price, and include the cost of a sight-saving eye operation in the price tag. For every pair you buy, you provide a sight-saving treatment for someone suffering from trachoma.
Andrew and the youngest member of the team
  QUALITY & PRICE CONTROL
 We believe high-quality sunglasses shouldn’t come at a high price. Don’t be fooled by the price tag, these glasses are of the same high quality as the sunglasses you see locked away in the glass cabinets at your favorite sports shop. We use the same materials, construction methods and high standards as the big names -- these glasses are made to last. We’ve been using and testing our samples for a couple of months now, and we’re very confident that they aren’t going to break the first time you sit on them in the car.
Because we have both designers and Vietnam-based manufacturing experts on our team, we’re able to work directly with the factory and sell directly to you. That means prices that don’t break the bank.
  High quality solid metal hinges and wire core temples
 The Sunglasses: Product Details

FIT 
Big head, small head, we’ve got you covered. Our sunglasses have a full metal support bar running the length of the temple, so they can be bent and adjusted to fit your head perfectly. No problem.
If there is an issue with your sunglasses, just send them back to us and we will take care of you, no questions asked. We want to keep the sunglasses on your head. The more you wear them and show them off, the better for everyone.
SPECS
Material: 100% black acetate with satin finish
Hinge: Heavy Duty 3 barrel Silver Nickel Hinge with full temple insert. A high quality hinge properly treated to not cause any allergies if in contact with the skin
Lens: Polarized TAC category 3 lens, with 100% UV Protection made from impact resistant polycarbonate. The grey lenses cut light without distorting colors.  
Temple length: 140mm (5.5 inches) 
Lens width: 53mm  (2 inches)
Nose bridge length: 20mm  (0.8 inches) 
Total width: 135mm
Made in Vietnam
 
The Partnership
Eye Gave and Sightsavers. Two different skill sets, one common mission.
We at Eye Gave are product developers, not eye doctors. Sightsavers will be doing the important work they specialize in: performing eye operations, dispensing medication and training locals to examine, treat and support people suffering from trachoma. Meanwhile, we concentrate on building a brand known for its loyalty to charities that do great things and amplifying their name and their work.
Sightsavers is an amazing international organization that changes lives for the long term. They work in more than 30 countries to eliminate avoidable blindness and support people with visual impairments to live independently.
What is Trachoma?
“Trachoma is probably one of the most neglected diseases in relation to its contribution to global suffering.” Dr. Anthony Solomon, Chief Scientist, Global Trachoma Mapping Project
Trachoma is an infectious eye disease. It is estimated that 41 million people worldwide, mostly women and children, have active trachoma infection and need treatment. If left alone, trachoma causes the eyelashes to grow inwards towards the eyeball, scratching the cornea and causing extreme pain -- and then blindness.
By providing these operations and treatments, we can allow people that are currently being cared FOR to care for others -- helping families function the way they should, allowing parents to go back to work and relieving the strain of having a disease in the family.
Where Did It Start?
The project started around four years ago as an idea that we could replace an everyday priced item - something that you would buy on a whim like a pair of those terrible sunglasses from the gas station - and do something amazing with it.  As a team, we have used our skills to find a factory, design the glasses, create the branding, build the partnership needed to do the good, and bring it all together for this campaign.
Timeline
We are far enough down the production line to set a firm timeline. If the campaign reaches its goal early, we will commit to the factory and "OK" the first sunglasses to be finished and shipped. We are confident that we can start shipping the sunglasses by the end of the campaign. We will be sure to update you on all progress we make and set clear goals.
Our Team 
Andrew: Design I have a passion for minimal product design. After an amazing Kickstarter campaign last year, I decided to use the know-how from that campaign to try and make a difference.  

Roger: Manufacturing
I have a passion for starting business that have a strong focus on making the world better. I now live and work in Vietnam, where I am coordinating the manufacturing process of our EyeGave sunglasses. 
Erica: Partnerships 
I have realized the unlimited potential for connecting projects with causes that help give back locally and globally. I coordinate our efforts with Sightsavers and manage delivery logistics.
Catherine: Messaging
My background is in marketing and brand messaging, and I'm passionate about helping businesses communicate their message effectively to help further their missions -- especially when that mission is for the greater good!
Thank You’s
Thank you for checking out the campaign. If you have any questions please add a comment to the comments section and we will be happy to help. Even if you can’t back at the level of the sunglasses, please back at the $1 level to stay in-the-know with updates and follow the instructions to share the campaign with the world.
Getting a product ready for market and creating a campaign like this is a huge undertaking. We have to take some space up here to thank those who have helped us along the way. Christine with Moth To Flame for the video, Sanderson Bob for the wonderful branding, Robin King and all the Sightsavers team, Paula, Margarida and Aymeric for production wisdom, Anemi for the B roll video and Mr. Vi for logistics.
                  SaveSaveSaveSaveSaveSaveSave
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have been working with the factory in Vietnam for over a year now. We have the first samples of the sunglasses in our hands, final testing and design changes have been made, and we're extremely happy with them.

We are now ready to go into production. As a team, we're making this our top priority. There are always hiccups along the way, but we do not see any major issues in delivering the sunglasses as promised. We will be sure to make regular and clear updates. It is our aim to under-promise and over-deliver. We would love to have these sunglasses being worn before the end of the summer.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello,
I hope this message finds you well. We would like to say thank you for your support. It means a lot to us all.
Unfortunately, it looks like we will not make our goal. It’s not the result we hoped for, but we have made a commitment to Sightsavers to help raise awareness of the great work they do and we’re going to stick to that commitment. We’re working on finding a way to make it work and are confident we will. But we do know one thing — we still plan on making the Eye Gave sunglasses!

Hi,
I hope you are well and have had a great week. We’ve had many questions about how the Eye Gave sunglasses will be made when we hit our goal, so we’d like to share with you some of the finer details in this update. We are really proud of the design, and we think you will be too.
THE FINER DETAILS

Hello Everyone -
First of all, thank you again for your support and for helping us spread the word! How did you hear about us? - Word of mouth? A friend? Social Media? Sightsavers? Please give us a shoutout and let us know in our comments section.
Spreading the word is important to Kickstarting this project. So, we’ve been hard at work sharing details about our product and cause. The sooner we reach our goal, the sooner we can ship everyone their sunglasses AND help Sightsavers! Check out these great posts by some of our supporters.

Hi,

I hope you are well. We wanted to send out a quick update now we have reached the halfway point of the campaign. We are 38% funded and are working hard to hit 100%. 

It is a marathon not a sprint!
We know that the harder we work the more lives we can impact. Please help us spread the word and make a difference. 








Save

Good evening, 
We hope your week is going well.
We've made it to $9000 and are taking a moment to celebrate! We still have a lot of work to do to reach our goal, but we're thinking positive. Thank you again for your support and for being a part of this journey with us.

campaign.story:
Protective, Performance-Enhancing, Weightlifting | Deadlift Socks 
These Patent Pending Weightlifting socks are meticulously designed with the needs of the athlete and weightlifter in mind. Whether it is competing in Regionals, AMARP, a new Max lift PR or conditioning in the off-season...I got you covered. Literally.
Say goodbye to bruised and battered shins.
(Warning: Graphic Imagery Below)
What a simple web search reveals:
These armored socks are a unique and innovative solution to an all to common occurrence: Injured Shins.
No more grinding, cutting or busting up your shins. Get stronger not injured.
Thanks for your help, Jess Poller
Comprised of the highest tech materials and designed to facilitate any movement where the weight begins on the floor.
I'm pulling the bar purposely into my shins here.
Protection from Proper Deadlift Form:
Deadlift technique:
However you were taught, or weren't taught, there are a few key points of the deadlift that everyone agrees on, besides the fact that that this lift is a necessity. These points are dictated by physics and confirmed by BroScience:
The bar will be over your mid-foot. ( Your center of gravity)

 The bar will be in physical contact with the leg.
(If you watch the best lifters closely, you can see the talcum powder flying off their legs as drag the bar up into position... )

Proper technique dictates contact with the bar.
The shoulders will be forward of the bar.The lower back will be held in normal, rigid extension. 
Bar Bell Knurling can cut, scrape and bruise the shins - even through socks.
Up until now you had only a few choices to protect your shins and none were optimal.
Duct tape alone or under socks,
Long Pants ( often hot) 
High socks  (often in conjunction with pants) 
High socks also tend to be thin which further limits their abrasion protection and are often "one size fits all", ironically the weave is pulled thinner on large athletes or any lifter with more muscular calves, providing the strongest with the least...
Neoprene shin warmers which "grab" the bar (an armored shin guard is a stretch goal, should this campaign succeed) and finally the
Old School method still in use which shows how little innovation has happened - cover your shins and thighs self in baby powder ortalcum to reduce friction...not always practical and always a mess.
Another choice, one that I was told to do, and one I found to be since, unacceptable - is just accept scarring and bruises and the risk possible serious infections... ( which happen more often you think at gyms, including Staph infections) 
I don't see the point of building a  physique at the price jacked up, scarred  legs. 
One of these methods may or may suffice on their own... but if training more than one modality, such as running and lifting for a WOD or metabolic conditioning, then there is no way to be comfortable and protected...until now.
Protection from Improper Deadlift Form:
Ok, if your setup is lacking, or you are learning, or you have some bad habits or mobility issues these socks will also protect you and help mitigate further injury but these are not meant to replace bad form, in fact the shin armor may allow better feedback to improve technique and function as teaching aid and help with finding the groove you wanted all along.
Protection from Improper Oly Form:
AMRAPS, Sets of 90% Maxes, True Maxes, improper hydration, you name it the reasons are endless why your form will invariably suffer, sometimes.. 
Unlike the Deadlift, on the Olympic lifts if you banging your shins there is problem with your technique... however if you are learning, just pushing yourself and your capabilities or working beyond technical failure - you still want these. 
Because Box Jumps. These socks will help mitigate any injuries from these and other physical activities involving impact / or rope burns:  OC / Spartan races, Mountain Biking, MotoCross, Skateboarding...
Armor Plated. The first line of defense. Breathable, flexible armor, low friction.
These innovative socks are specially designed with laminate armor to provide shin protection that is without parallel. Deadlift, Snatch or Clean for PRs or AMARP with confidence.
The armor is comprised of thousands of precisely positioned guard platelets and epoxy resin coating to provide a flexible barrier from abrasion, scuffs, and scrapes – the armor was initially designed by Higher Dimension Materials, Inc to offer protection against stabs (as in knife attacks…) so it is guaranteed to offer protection from even from the gnarliest barbell knurling.
 The armor plates in this highly innovative and precisely engineered material are flexible, breathable and quick drying.
Low Friction
Additionally the armor provides a low friction environment to facilitate pulls and up your max, as proper deadlift form has you pulling the barbell up your legs you are not just pulling against gravity – but also friction. 

Close up:
A Truly Super Fabric.
I tested and researched many different materials and designs, sourced from tactical, military, aerospace industries worldwide and fabric even designed for NASA, before being referred to Higher Dimensions, Inc. I remain extremely impressed by the properties of this "Armor." 
Look at the examples below:
This material is pretty bad ass: here is a link involving a live Rattlesnake.

And here is a link demonstrating its appeal in industrial settings. This is a longer video, however the Armor depicted is same as offered here. 
Padded. A second layer of protection
Just the right amount of material and helps protect against the barbell cutting and bruising your shins. Robust enough offer protection against rope burns and even missed box jumps, light and thin enough you won’t notice it is there. 
 Innovative Sock Design. Designed for lifters.
Proprietary blend of fibers woven in sock offer even more functionality
Abrasion resistant fibers

Low friction zone to facilitates pulls

Cooling / Wicking properties 

Anti odor and Antimicrobial
Innovative, performance and strength promoting design 
Tightly woven knit prevents barbell knurling from catching

Over the Calf Length for protection

Cooling / Wicking properties 

Ergonomic left and right foot designs, promotes stability.

Ventilated mesh areas

Arch Support and secure fit for comfort 

Cushioning at heel and toes to minimize impact and maximized shock absorption

Awesomeness
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I did the heavy lifting early. Pun intended.

I made the initial investment(s), researched the market and placed factory and purchase orders. The factories are waiting.

I spent most of the last few months working to mitigate as many risks as possible. I will always be transparent with the challenges.

I learned a tremendous amount in making the prototypes and plan on learning more. 

Beta Testing: The product may be further refined based on future feedback from athletes and the weightlifting community. Changes and refinements will only be made if they enhance the product experience.

Ship date: I have built in extra time for the manufacturing process and I am confident that the product will ship by the projected dates. I'll keep this community appraised and informed.

Supplier coordination: This is a unique product with several production steps. While each stage of production has its own challenges, I work with a few suppliers to ensure that the product is developed correctly.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Yes, unfortunately running a business and producing key organizers can come with some risks. This is our second Kickstarter campaign, so we may have just a little experience from our previous campaign. But we don't like over-promising something - so here's a few potential issues that may arise.

Manufacturing: The MIM process (Metal Injection Molding), is a much more efficient mode of manufacturing and doesn't waste as much material as CNC machining. However, MIM is a relatively new manufacturing method and to achieve the level of finish and quality may cause the product to be subject to delays. However, in saying this, we are able to assess and manage this risk appropriately.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
I am Heikki and this is my invention. 20 years ago I moved to deep forest of Sipoo in Finland. I started cutting down trees and clearing the rocky site to build a home for my wife and me, to enjoy our retirement. Very soon I got angry on traditional axes, because they were so dangerous and hard to work with. The axe struck me more than once. I had to swing the axe high over my head to build up enough speed to split those fresh logs and eventually this activity started to give me back pain.
Years and years went by and numerous ideas began to take shape. One day I was levering yard stones with a crowbar and then it struck me – I finally knew the answer to my problem! I was sure that crowbar’s prying power over big rocks and stumps could be also applied to an axe. I threw the crowbar into the bushes, ran to the kitchen and started to sketch out my new lever-based axe.
I realized my plans by making numerous prototypes of my axe at a local steel workshop. Prototype by prototype I developed new features to make my invention safer and more effective. Finally I got to this combination of beautiful design and incomparable functionality.
Now, together with my team, we have managed to make a small production batch. However, to produce on a larger scale, we require expensive production tooling. This far the feedback from users has been amazing! And most importantly, there have been no accidents with Leveraxe since we started selling them.
Recently, we started thinking how could we make more of these axes and how to make more people happy with this axe. We know that the design is finally ready to be brought in front of wider public but this is where we need your help.
At this moment we are basically in homestretch with all our R&D work. Together with our team we have sorted out all engineering issues and chosen materials to be used for the new version of Leveraxe.
The new handle will be made of engineering compound, characterized by high mechanical strength, stiffness and thermal resistance. Most futuristic about this part is that it is hollow inside, making the Leveraxe even lighter, which in turn helps to build up more speed when in action. Furthermore, this polyamide offers high toughness at low temperatures as well as easy processing during production.
The new axe head will be made of iron alloy, which enables us to produce more complicated products in one step but also offer excellent wear resistance in later use. Regarding the design we will keep all the proven features like the side hook, which will clamp on the log after the swing, thus reducing the risk of hitting yourself.
We have totally reinvented the oldest tool known to mankind. Leveraxe is a smart wood-splitting device. It is simply clever!
Leveraxe is based on a lever mechanism and rotational action. The head is attached from the side, not the center, which alters its center of gravity.
After you hit a log, Leveraxe head will break in few millimeters and then stops. At the same time counterweight on the right side of the head forces the axe to fall sideways, splitting the log apart with ease. Because of that Leveraxe can handle all common hardwood.
PLAY

We are currently working together with top manufacturers to produce the new version of Leveraxe. However, to produce on a larger scale we require expensive production tooling.
Please help us fund our project and be part of this historical adventure of reinventing the oldest tool known to mankind - lets make it happen together!
We have been testing prototypes with people around the world and the feedback has been more than amazing. Leveraxe really works like promised.
Thank you for considering backing our project in Kickstarter. I am sure you will find nothing else like Leveraxe – in terms of design, function and overall quality – anywhere in the world.
To reward you helping us kick-start this project, we offer our invention in limited colors and with very special price. Make sure to check out the green Leveraxe Kickstarter Special Edition in available pledges!
Should you choose a Leveraxe, congratulations and welcome to the family – as you are starting a wonderful journey amongst many others! It will give you many years of enjoyment as it is built to last decades.
Kind regards,
Heikki Kärnä
Inventor
INTERNATIONAL BACKERS
We are proud to have Leveraxe fans all over the world. We will ship Leveraxe worldwide. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable when ordering to your region.
ESTIMATED DELIVERY
While we do not expect this to change, it is possible that the estimated shipment month may shift, but we keep you guys posted! Also, please read "Risks and challenges" section.
WARRANTY
We stand firmly behind our products. Each Leveraxe head has 10 years warranty.
NEED HELP?
We are here for you. If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign, you can always reach us at kickstarter@leveraxe.com.
Let the whole world know about it
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
A lot can go wrong getting our latest prototype production-ready, but in current stage we are very confident. To support our confidence is the fact that we have already done it once before. The things we worry about:

Finalizing the Leveraxe head and handle production moulds may take longer than we have currently planned. This may mean a few weeks delay in estimated shipping deadlines.

We haven't finalized the optimal packaging for the new Leveraxe yet (something we would like to do together with you giving some options to choose from), but if something goes wrong here, we have our current solid solution we can use.

Forecasting risk is basically the only real thing we worry about. We can't predict the outcome of our Kickstarter campaign. Should we miss our projections, we might expect some delays with delivery, but we’ll let you know as quickly as possible.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Assembly of new Leveraxes has been started!
updates.update_content:
Injectionmolding tool for handle in ready, tryouted and fine tuned.
For handles still make some more tests and then we are ready to deliver the handles for assembly.
The injection molding tool for Holding tube is ready and the part production will be done next coming days.

Our team was extremely busy in arranging all the process, especially manufacturing.

Tools for plastic parts are in progress. They are about 80% ready. We are expecting to make first molding try out very soon.
Here you can see some pictures about tooling progress and short video about EDM process on the handle tool.
PLAY

Thank you all so much for helping us reach the half way towards our goal! Let's keep this wonderful journey rolling and let's make it happen together! Everybody who has backed our project this far, we are happy that you joined family of Leveraxe. We love you!

project_data.project_name: New Leveraxe - The Smart Axe

campaign.story:
Missed This Kickstarter Project?
Then Click Here To See If This Titanium Carabiner Is Still Available...
Dear Friend,
If you’re interested in high-end titanium carabiners, then this is going to be the most exciting message you ever read!
Here’s why:
I’ve been asked time and again by raving fans and die-hard customers to produce a titanium carabiner.
Emails... comments... private messages. I’ve had them all. Almost daily. And so, for the last little while it’s felt like I’ve been held at gunpoint!
Long story short:
I decided to "bite the bullet" and create what you wanted.
So after an obscene amount of design, development, testing and tweaking...
I can finally reveal to you the TiBiner™:
The TiBiner™ is the ultimate key-chain carabiner - designed specifically for this type of use. Ultra-light and super-simple to clip on and off.
The model of the TiBiner™ above is the 'T60' - it's a fully-titanium, ultra-minimalist never-before-released carabiner.
But it gets better...
A few months ago I created a limited run of double-ended titanium carabiners and they sold out in just a few hours - it was crazy!
And, as with pretty much every product that sells-out on my website - there was a mob of frenzied customers asking, and even demanding, I make them again.
The truth is:
I've further developed and refined that double-ended titanium carabiner and am now giving you access to it.
And this carabiner is called the TiBiner™ 'T60D':
This is the 'T60D' model of the TiBiner™ - the 'D' stands for "Double" because of the double-ended functionality.
Just for the record,
The T60D has all the same unique, custom design features as the T60.
Simply put:
The T60D has gone through the same rigorous, no-holds-barred development process as the T60 - so you know it's tried, tested and proven!
The 'D' in the T60D name stands for 'Double'... because of it's double-ended design.
It's kinda crazy... not only is the TiBiner™ down-to-earth functional, but it's possibly the SEXIEST carabiner ever made!
Have you got a "bug out" bag ready to grab and take with you in an emergency situation?... then a set of TiBiners™ are an absolute MUST!
  And here's what you need to know about the TiBiner™ T60 and T60D:
Made entirely from Grade 5 Titanium (so you’ve got the ultimate combination of strength, lightness and absolute bragging rights!)
Only one moving part -- no complex hinges or pins to go wrong (because of its simple design you can have absolute confidence your TiBiner™ is never going to seize, stick or fall apart!)
Proprietary “Quick Release” lever design (you will be un-clipping your TiBiner™ with a single, easy press of the unique lever mechanism… EVERY time!)
Easy “snap on” clipping action (just push the spring-lever of the TiBiner™ onto whatever it is you want to clip it onto in one quick motion!)
You know, I don't think I could make the TiBiner™ T60 any simpler for you if I tried!
Pssst, here's a little secret... the TiBiner™ T60D is actually stronger than the original T60 model.
At just over 60mm (2 1/4") long the TiBiner™ T60 and T60D sit perfectly in the "sweet spot" in terms of size.
Specifically designed for everyday use -- so no “over-engineering” (this means you're getting a titanium carabiner that does exactly what it's supposed to without any unnecessary weight... or features you'll never use!)
Proprietary Matte finish (your TiBiner™ is going to get the same proprietary silky-smooth, Matte finish my other high-end titanium products get!)
Smart “hook” to help prevent accidental un-clipping (this is the same unique function I’ve used on other titanium products... so you can be damn sure it works!)
Pocket-friendly size (the TiBiner™ was designed to be not-too-big and not-too-small... it’s the “Goldilocks” of carabiners – you will almost certainly find it “just right”!)
Here's the T60 together with a bunch of my other high-end, titanium products: TiWrench™, PryMal™, TiTweezers™, and TiClaw™
Made from rock-solid 3.5mm -- 0.140” -- titanium (so you ‘ve got the ultimate combination of super-strength and ultra-lightness all rolled into one!)
Beveled edges (it's not just good enough for the TiBiner™ to be "functional"... I made sure it also looks damn good too - so you can be the envy of your friends and family!)
Precision machined (the design and machining tolerances of the TiBiner™ gets well into aerospace industry accuracy -- perfect for you to boast about at parties!)
Guaranteed for life (as with everything I create... you’re going to get my personal 100% unconditional guarantee!)
Precision engineered beveling on the TiBiners™ pretty much guarantees you will be envied by anyone you show these to. You have been warned!
Heres' the T60 and T60D next to a standard 'AA' battery to help you visualise the size of them.
Works as a super-secure pocket-clip (not only can you hang your TiBiner™ off your belt-loop... but, when you clip it on the edge of your pocket, it “locks on” like alligator jaws!)
Minimalist design (you’ve got the ultimate no-nonsense titanium carabiner that not only looks good... but it has literally nothing to “go wrong” either!)
Ultimate camping and hiking companion (a set of TiBiners™ are indispensable when out in the wilderness -- from tying onto paracord to hanging your gear!)
To be honest... The TiBiner™ T60D model in particular is the carabiner you're unlikely to be able to do without once you've taken it on your first hiking or camping trip!
Remember... the TiBiner™ is ultra-light and because it's made from Grade 5 Titanium - it will probably be something you pass down to your grandchildren!
Silky-smooth lever-action (the spring-lever opening mechanism design has been tweaked and tested so it works 1000 times out of 1000 tests!)
Super-grippy “finger grip” grooves (the TiBiner™ has the tried-and-tested grip-pattern found on many of my other products... so it will never slip or slide when you’re pressing the spring-lever to open it!)
The T60 was pretty much made-to-measure for the task of belt-loop hanging of your keys and everyday carry gear.
Like I said:
I was pretty much forced to create these high-end, titanium carabiners. My previous Customers demanded it!
And truthfully...
I really didn't want to disappoint my previous Backers and Customers because of the great emails, comments and private messages I continually receive from them.
Here's just a small sample of what I'm talking about:
Back to what I was saying...
The TiBiner™ has been designed for every day use on belt-loops, rucksacks, and so on.
It's not designed for you to swing yourself from the nearest cliff... and so there is no "over-engineering".
The TiBiner™ is super-light, ultra-minimalist and made to last several lifetimes (literally!).
Did I mention the precision of the machining of the TiBiner™ reaches near-aerospace tolerances!
But the bottom line is...
The TiBiner™ was designed and created because my previous Customers wanted a high-end, one-of-a-kind-and-nothing-held-back titanium carabiner.
And this was because they were blown-away by my blisteringly successful HookUp™ clips I created on a previous Kickstarter project.
You will barely notice two or three TiBiner™ T60D carabiners clipped onto your backpack... but they will be ready for action when you NEED them!
Wait, there's more...
Let's run through some of the unique features of the TiBiner™:
Custom Beveled Edges
I wasn't happy to settle for just a minimalist design for the TiBiner™.
So I took things a little further and added custom beveling to the design.
Don't blame me if your friends and family are shamefully envious of your TiBiner™!
Proprietary Matte Finish
Having now designed and created over a dozen different, high-end titanium products... I've got the surface finish perfected!
Your TiBiner™ is going to have the same buttery-smooth and absolutely flawless Matte finish as my other sought-after titanium products.
Super-Secure "Hook"
To ensure your TiBiner™ has absolutely no risk of slipping off whatever you have it clipped onto...
... I've specifically designed-in a "hook" where the spring-lever closes.
You can have 100% confidence that whenever you clip your TiBiner™ onto something, then it's damn well going to stay there!
One-Piece, Easy-To-Press "Quick Release" Spring-Lever
After perfecting the spring-lever on previous titanium products...
...I re-designed this same tried-tested-and-proven mechanism for the TiBiner™.
As far as I know, this easy-to-press lever mechanism is unique to my designs. It's super-practical and makes un-clipping your TiBiner™ incredibly easy.
Quite simply:
The TiBiner™ spring-lever mechanism is the ultimate in simplicity and reliability.
Ultra-Grippy "Finger Grips"
The finger-grip pattern on the TiBiner™ is the same tried-and-tested pattern I've used on a ton of my other products.
So you can be damn sure your fingers are never going to slip or slide when unclipping your TiBiner™.
Last but not least...
You may already know this, but I always offer a lifetime guarantee with everything I create.
And the TiBiner™ is no different.
You’re going to be getting my personal 100% Unconditional Money-Back Guarantee.
If you’re not absolutely blown-away by your TiBiner™ the moment you open the packaging... then just ask me for you pledge amount back. And I’ll give you back every single penny no questions asked.
Not only that, but...
If you somehow manage to bend or break your TiBiner™ just let me know and I'll replace it for you immediately!
Oh, and one more thing...
The reason I can offer you this guarantee is because of the absolute confidence I (and my Customers) have in what I produce. Simple.
If you're going hiking or camping, then you really don't want to be setting out without at least four or five TiBiners™.
Vitally important last and final point:
I've created two ***Kickstarter Exclusive*** Reward Packages specifically for YOU.
These packages are way, WAY below the planned retail price... and, quite frankly, are an obscenely good offer (even if I say so myself).
Here's why I've been forced to make this Magnus-has-gone-stark-raving-mad offer to you...
I've just paid the deposit on a new "fancy pants" tumbler (so I can get an even better finish on my high-end titanium products). And now I've got to come up with the cash to pay for the rest of it!
Simply put:
My back is against the wall on this one. I literally have to do whatever it takes... and making you "an offer you can't refuse" is pretty much my only hope at this point.
The best part is, you are the one that's going to benefit the most from this situation I'm now in.
Don't get me wrong...
I've not "cornered" myself here - worst case scenario is that I put the new tumbler on hold ...or I get a bank loan (which I really don't want to do - because I'd much rather give you this incredible never-to-be-repeated offer than hand over cash to some "Fat Cat" bankers!)
Take a look at the Rewards below -- particularly the ***Kickstarter Exclusive*** Reward Packages -- and discover just how good these one-time offers are...
Let’s take care of this...
Now you've seen the Rewards above - it's time to pledge for the one that works best for you. Scroll to the top of this page and click on the Reward level you want to pledge for.
One last thing...
I’m not sure if I’ll continue to produce the TiBiner™ after this Kickstarter project is finished and the Rewards are shipped out.
Backing this project right now is the only way you can guarantee you’re going to get access to the TiBiners™.
Don’t delay! Scroll to the top of this page and click on the Reward you want to pledge for RIGHT NOW!
Sincerely,
Magnus Macdonald
P.S. Remember... even when this project gets funded and I ship out all the Rewards - I cannot guarantee I’ll be producing the TiBiners™ ever again. And, even if I did, they will almost certainly never be at this exclusive-to-Kickstarter low price.
P.P.S. Don’t forget... You’re getting my personal, 100% unconditional money-back guarantee with your TiBiners™ (which means you can return your Reward to me for any reason... or even no reason at all... and I’ll give you back every penny of your pledge amount. No questions asked).
P.P.P.S. One last thing... You’re getting what are possibly the most original, minimalist, high-end and fully Grade 5 titanium carabiners ever produced. The only way you can guarantee you “lock in” yours is to scroll to the top of this page and pledge for the Reward you want RIGHT NOW!
FAQs
Why Does Your Profile Show This Is Your First Kickstarter Project (…When I Know You’ve Launched Four Very Successful Kickstarter Projects In The Past)?
A couple of super-simple reasons:
#1 – After Backing around 70 other Kickstarter projects I want to try and keep a Kickstarter account as a Project Creator separate to the account I pledge with.
#2 – As Cogent Industries (that’s my fancy-sounding business name :-D) grows, then I hope to start being able to ship from locations closer to where YOU live. This would have huge benefits in terms of speed, reliability of delivery, import tax, and so on.
(Some of the products from my previous Kickstarter campaigns are available on my website).
Why Do You Offer An Unconditional Money-Back Guarantee?
Simple: I am very, VERY confident of the quality of what I make.
I can’t see any reason why I wouldn’t offer such a guarantee to you. It’s difficult for you to see the quality of the TiBiners™ BEFORE you physically receive them.
So what I CAN do for you is to remove ALL “risk” in backing this project. Know that you can return your TiBiners™ if you're not blown-away by the quality and functionality of them.
How Do I Order Multiple Rewards?
It's EASY... just double your pledge amount for whichever Reward you've selected and you'll receive two of that Reward. (...and if you want three of a particular Reward - then just pledge three times the price of that Reward)
Why Don’t You Have Any Stretch Goals?
I try to provide you with the best Rewards possible before I launch a campaign - so I don't typically do stretch goals.
I anticipate the TiBiner™ project being successful and getting reasonably "over-funded".
However, should this project really take-off and get funded well above the funding level ...I may then offer some stretch goals. That’s fair, right?
Will Your Titanium HookUp™ Clips Fit On The TiBiner™?
They will fit on, yes. BUT...
Because the HookUp™ clips are so compact - they cannot just "clip" on... they can only be put on the TiBiner™ by opening the spring-lever of the TiBiner™ itself.
But the good news is that I plan to produce some larger version of the HookUp™ clips soon so this will be a non-issue.
How Strong Are The Carabiners?
These carabiners are specifically designed for everyday use.
The carabiners have been engineered to be compact, light and minimalist... for use on belt-loops, rucksacks and so on.
Simply put:
These are not “heavy-duty” carabiners for you to go climbing. And so I have not done any form of official breaking-strain tests.
They are super-strong and will handle pretty much anything you throw at them in everyday use.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I have over a dozen titanium products to my name now. All of them designed, made and shipped myself!

Simply put:

I have the processes and systems in place to fulfill the project on time (and, most likely, ahead of time).

The only real issue would be if I was significantly over-funded by some huge amount (unlikely). And even then the worst-case scenario would just be a short delay in shipping.

Overall... no significant concerns.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Yes, I know, I've been as silent as a submarine!
But, here's the great news (and photos). The TiBiner™ Rewards are now 90% shipped! (...just a few more to go).

Great news for you...
It's "Backer Survey" time!
Very soon (within a day) you'll be receiving your Backer survey from me so you can confirm your address and let me know which Tibiner™ model(s) you pledged for.
Vitally IMPORTANT:
Can you take a look at the image below and make sure you're familiar with each of the three models below (the '', '' and '')... this way, when I send your Backer Survey, you can fill it in with absolute confidence! :-D

Yes yes, I know, it's been a while since the last Update.
But here's the good news...
After a very slow start (like a steam-train just leaving the station and trying to overcome its own inertia) we're now "full steam ahead"!
(sorry about that really bad train analogy! :-D)

Okay, I need to ask you a quick favour...
(it will speed up your TiBiners™ if you can do this :-D)
I tend not to send out Backer Surveys until a week before shipping - so, I'm going to gauge how many of each type of Tibiner™ I need to produce now to help move things along faster.
If you're not already aware... I added another design to the first two designs. And so the good news is that you also have the option of selecting this design.

A real quick Update for you today...
Three quick things:
#1
I'm hoping to start the cutting of your TiBiners™ in the next two weeks.

Yes, I know...
It's been nearly a week since the campaign ended... and I'm only now sending out an official thank you Update.
Shame. On. Me.
I know it's shamefully late, but... THANK YOU!

I know what you might be thinking here...
You've probably already scrolled down and seen the screenshots below.
And so you know I'm about to talk about chopsticks!
It's funny...

project_data.project_name: TiBiner™: Ultimate Titanium Carabiner For Everyday Carry EDC

campaign.story:
As Seen On..
Portable speakers offer great flexibility, but when speaking to friends and family we discovered that most portable speakers spend the majority of their time used at home or the office.
Larger permanent speakers provide great quality sound, but are a burden to move between rooms, and aren't designed to be used on the go. 
We understand that music lovers want the ability to move quality sound with them. From room to room, their house to a friends’ or even home to office. 
With Proper Audio 2, we want to create a speaker that is truly the best of both worlds.
Elegantly Mount Your Music
Putting your speaker on a wall not only looks insanely cool, but creates a full room sound experience, elevating your speaker to ear level and making the most of your music, whether listening alone or with a room full of friends.
It's Easy to Install and Mount
The Proper Audio 2 mount disks are available in Black or White and install in 2 seconds with simple, residue free 3M adhesive.  Once installed, it's only a quick 'turn a click' to mount or remove.
PLAY

It Moves Effortlessly
The slim, low profile mount disks are barely visible, meaning you can feel comfortable sticking one to a wall in every room, and then taking Proper Audio 2 with you, wherever you are at any given time.
PLAY

It Can Be Taken Anywhere
Being battery powered and offering a full 8 hours of use on a single charge, it also loves being taken on the go, and is light & durable with a soft rubber base to rest comfortbaly on any surface, anywhere.
It Connects to All Devices
Proper Audio 2 is powered by Bluetooth which allows you to wirelessly connect and play music without cables and without limits. Almost every smart phone, tablet, laptop, etc is equipped with Bluetooth. Universally compatible and works with iOS, Android, Mac OSX, Blackberry, Windows, etc.
PLAY

Engineered for Room Filling Sound
Proper Audio 2's high performance acoustic chamber and driver cone design spread the sound evenly throughout the room for a full, 360-degree audio experience. You will enjoy an impressive 85db of rich, well balanced sound.
For PA2, we have also integrated a passive bass driver, which allows us to generate the great deep low end audio of a quality powered woofer, without draining any battery power.
We have been enjoying Proper Audio 2 mounted to our studio walls for the past 3 months, listening to our favorite Spotify playlists all day, everyday. We're so excited about how great it sounds, and, for any Melbourne backers, we invite you to visit our studio anytime to meet the team experience it yourself!
It's Feature Packed
It's the Ultimate iPhone Dock
Proper Audio 2 is also the worlds first magnetic iPhone speaker mount. With simple tap and go iPhone mounting, your speaker becomes the best place to leave your iPhone and enjoy movies, music videos, coverflow, facetime, skype or anything else with great, big sound.  It's a completely new speaker experience that truly integrates your iPhone and takes advantage of your iPhone's beautiful screen.
Four high powered (and electronics-safe) neodymium magnets are hidden beneath the 'M Lock' mount plate at the center of PA2's droplet mesh. Mounting your iPhone is a matter of a simple tap-on/tap-off when used in conjunction with Proper™ M Lock iPhone cases, available for iPhone 4 to 6 Plus.
Here are some great apps that look beautiful and work seamlessly with the Proper Audio + iPhone Mount setup:
It's a Speakerphone
It's not only about great music. Proper Audio 2 also works seamlessly as a hands free Speakerphone. Our onboard noise-cancelling microphone means you're heard clearly on the receiving end, and our superior audio components mean your caller is heard loud and clear.  PA2's speakerphone functionality turns regular phone calls into experiences that feel like the person is right in the room with you.
Your iPhone is already designed to move between music and phone calls seamlessly, and Proper Audio 2 makes that experience bigger and better in every way. When a call comes in, your music fades out and the call can be answered. Done talking? Your music fades back in and picks up right where it left off.
It's Beautifully Minimal 
Much of our design work has centered around squeezing a lot of technology into the simplest of shapes, a circle. With this minimal approach, we are left with only the absolutely necessary details, keeping the focus on one thing - your music. Spheres are also ideal acoustic sound chambers, and the shape plays a big role in helping us deliver beautiful audio in a small, lightweight speaker.
We can’t wait to share this great project with you. By pledging, you get us one step closer to making this product available to iPhone lovers all around the world, and you will have the satisfaction of knowing YOU helped make it happen.
Why we need your help
Several generations of prototypes and more than 12 months of design development has already gone into Proper Audio 2. To start mass production we need to make considerable purchases, including injection moulding tools and electronic components. What you contribution will help us do:
$4K, Kickstarter and Amazon Payment Fees
$10K, Injection Moulding Tools
$12K, Global Bluetooth Certifications and PCB Development
$14K, First Production Run
We have seen a lot of Kickstarter projects take months and even years to hit their delivery dates, we have been designing and manufacturing products for over 4 years and have great respect for how long products "really" take to get to market. We have been testing working prototypes for the last few months, they perform exactly as we intend the final units to perform, so we are as ready as our project could be. 
This is our anticipated timeline:
Who is Studio Proper?
We're the 4 year old industrial design studio behind the Proper™ range of iPhone & iPad cases, stands and modular mounts. We're based in Melbourne, Australia and our products currently ship to over 70 countries.
As a team, we believe that music is an experience that goes far beyond what you hear; it's also what you see and what you feel. It's also something we all love sharing with friends and family. How you interact with your music creates the experience that we all strive for in our everyday lives.
How Proper Audio 2 Came About
This product is the result of a previous, paused Kickstarter campaign. We're thankful to the hundreds of Kickstarter pledgers who provided us with such quality feedback the first time around, and voiced their desire for this product to be made. 
We listened, and have spent the last year further developing PA2, focusing on performance, usability, aesthetics and most importantly first class audio quality, combining it all into a single product experience we know you are going to love.
The Team
Taking everything you loved about PA1, and working hard to add the features our backers requested, we went ahead and tweaked the design. The result is Proper Audio 2 - a speaker that does everything you want it to, and much more.
In order to bring Proper Audio 2 to life, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for your very own speaker, but also sharing this project with your friends. Something as simple as tweeting about our page or sharing our Facebook page will go a long way to our combined success. So please take a moment and click on the Facebook, Twitter and Instagram tabs at the top of the page and lets do this together!
Team Studio Proper :-)
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We know all too well that every pre-production product has inherent risks and challenges, some of them unforeseen.

We've been developing and manufacturing consumer products for close to 4 years and have a deep understand of the entire process. We consider our manufacturing experience to be one of our greatest strengths at Studio Proper. Through selling our current range of products, we have very strong existing manufacturing relationships.

We've spent the last year working hard vetting factories, coordinating assembly of the final product, and cultivating positive, personal relationships with our suppliers (this is really important in China!). We've finalised the product design focusing on manufacturability, developed working prototypes, and with Studio Proper staff on the factory floor we have structured QC for every unit that comes off the production line.

We've learned an immense amount along the way, and we've taken pre-emptive steps that we hope will mean there are no surprises along the way. We've invested a lot of focus pre-Kickstarter, to get to a point where we're confident the product is proven and manufacturable with minimal alterations.

That said, producing anything has challenges. International holidays can often slow down production time and there's always the chance for unforeseen issues, but we're confident that once we begin manufacturing with the funds this campaign raises, we've done the hard work upfront to make sure everything goes smoothly. Past that, already have a proven supply chain that can scale and distribute effectively.

We are very proud of this product, and very dedicated to bringing it to you. Let's make this happen!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Missed our Kickstarter Campaign? Find us here: www.alexbottle.com 
Meet ALEX.
Twist Open. Clean Easy. Smelly bottles are a thing of the past. Clean easily by hand or toss in the dishwasher. 
Pack Small. When empty, ALEX compacts to half its size. Take back precious space.
Missed our Kickstarter Campaign? Find us here at: www.alexbottle.com 
Swap Colors. Mix and match ALEX to create your favorite color combo. You create it and we'll make it for you. (see "customized bottle" rewards)
 Colored Up. 
 *Black/Olive + White/Burgundy will unlock if when hit our stretch goals. 
One bottle or two cups. We don't think you should drink alone; unless you want too.
Be Sneaky...
 It all started at the sink.
Chris Hotell was a simple man who loved his stainless steel water bottle, but a smelly residue from water and smoothies collected on the inside too quickly. When armed with dish soap and hyper-maneuverable scrub brushes, he still couldn't loosen the bacteria from the bottle. Not willing to surrender to unhealthy wasteful disposable plastic bottles, he needed something that made sustainability simple. A phone call to mom yielded some ideas; a drinking vessel designed to open up in the middle for easy cleaning that can compact to half its size when empty.
Resilient and ever thirsty, Chris grabbed his sketch pad and hacksaw. From a shower of metal filings, eraser crumbs, and graphite smudges, ALEX was born.
ALEX stands for something.
A devious do-gooder from the start, ALEX is an acronym for "Always Live Extraordinarily". We believe that innovation with a conscience is an idea that people can get behind. By personifying ALEX, it becomes more than just a water bottle; it becomes a part of your family.
Mission In A Bottle.
ALEX is made by a small group of individuals who seek to improve the planet, one idea at a time. Our products reflect strong passions for creative design, functional integrity, and simplicity. If we ever successfully bottle the cosmos, you’ll be among the first to get a straw.
What's ALEX made of?
ALEX may be really ridiculously good looking, but it’s what’s on the inside that counts. Made with 100% BPA Free premium grade stainless steel and a strap from 100% recycled water bottles, ALEX naturally attracts health conscious citizens of mother earth.
BPA Free Premium Grade 304 Stainless Steel 
BPA FREE Polypropylene #5 Cap and Mid Body Band 
ALEX is top rack dishwasher safe 
Fits ice cubes, but not rapper Ice Cube 
Strap made from recycled plastic bottles 
Fits most cup holders and bike bottle cages 
Cap covers bottle lip Smoothie, powder drink and oatmeal friendly 
All sealing o-rings and gaskets made from Food Grade Silicone
Conceived in the USA, Responsibly made in China
With proper care, your ALEX bottle will outlast an endless summer, a long and illustrious career, a storybook marriage, and a brick lollipop. Your bottle will most likely NOT outlast true love, the universe, and other ALEX bottles.
Missed our Kickstarter Campaign? Find us here at: www.alexbottle.com
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have a team that's experienced in manufacturing and we've done as much work as possible in the past year to minimize the risk for our Kickstarter backers but we're not perfect and we know there may be some hurdles along the way. 

To minimize risk:
We vetted tons of manufacturers and have aligned with an amazing manufacturing partner with experience making technical bottles for top brands and has ISO Certifications for both Quality and Sustainability.

We've streamlined the ALEX Bottle design with our mechanical engineer and manufacturing partner to ensure the highest level of success. 

We've paid for the expensive tooling costs ourselves so we could test ALEX and guarantee the highest quality bottle to our Kickstarter backers.

Shipping:
We've added time to our shipping schedule to make sure we hit our delivery dates, but we know there are factors out of our control that could cause delays.

Our goal is to run a seamless operation however things do occur that cause production and shipping to slow down. That's the nature of manufacturing. We will always keep our backers updated with our progress and should any issues arise, we'll explain exactly what we're doing to overcome it and ensure you're having drinks with ALEX on time.

International Shipping:
Shipping individual bottles around the world can be very costly depending on delivery location. If rates fluctuate from our estimates we'll notify you immediately.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Wolf is an intelligent pair of cycling lights that keeps you and your team safe when riding, even in cramped conditions. Envisioned by engineer Ewen Smith and product designer Daniel Hood, Wolf is the first product by startup cycling technology firm, Augur. Wolf is a seamless blend of efficient lighting and an intelligent, onboard controller. Wolf keeps you and your team seen and safe - and ahead of the pack.  
Front Lamp: See Further, Be Safer.
Collective Safety - The Next Thing You'll Never Cycle Without
Collective Safety underpins the need for Wolf. As a cyclist, I've seen too many avoidable crashes, bumps and scrapes caused by the dangers (and thrills) of riding in a peloton. A clear view ahead becomes a dazzling brightness as another cyclist's light cuts across your vision. Cycling with your teammates, this can be quite dangerous. This is why we have invented Wolf and Collective Safety. 
Collective Safety is an intelligent communications system built into every Wolf light. Wolf is constantly searching for members of its pack. When it finds another Wolf light, it automatically activates the safest lighting mode, calculating distance and speed. In a peloton, it means that cyclists on the outside have the brightest lights, while those in the middle are dimmed, ensuring that everyone can see - and be seen - safely. Collective Safely keeps you and your team out of harm's way. 
Anatomy of a Wolf
Wolf by Augur is made by cyclists. We have carefully considered how our design and materials can meet your needs and improve your ride. Industry leading CREE LEDs meet machined aluminium. Onboard electronics are designed to handle robustly the challenges faced by the toughest road warriors. To get you salivating, take a look at what Wolf is packing: 
Machined, 6061 anodised aluminium
Long life rechargeable lithium polymer batteries
IP56 rating to prevent water and dust entering the lights
Compact, light, cordless design
Secure silicone attachment straps
Four Modes: Every Situation Covered
No two rides are ever the same. With four intelligent lighting modes, Wolf has something for everyone - at all times. Stay on a mode for at least 20 seconds, and the next time you wake up your Wolf lights, they'll remember that mode and be ready to go.
Collective Safety at work: Outermost lights are bright, while inner rear lights are dim. All the safety, none of the blinding.
High Intensity Strobe lets everyone know you're coming. Signal to other road users that you and the team are on the way. Wolf's high intensity strobe focuses attention where and when you need it. 
Full Power Beam cuts through the darkness. Pump 165 lumens in a 20 degree wide beam straight ahead. See further so you can go faster. Improve your situational awareness with a market leading brightness to runtime ratio in this well known and loved power mode. 
Low Intensity Blink a healthy mix of visibility and battery conservation. A slower strobe, the low intensity blink mode keeps you visible for longer and is suited to lower-risk riding. 
Low Intensity Beam is perfect for twilight riding, when you don't need a full beam but still need help to see where you're going. Simply set the beam and cycle. It's that easy. 
And because there is nothing worse that running out of battery while on the bike, there's a special fifth mode to get you home super safe:
Power Reserve keeps your light going till you're home safely. Power Reserve mode comes on automatically if the battery is low, giving you an extra long runtime to get home safely. 
Sustainable - End to End
We started Augur because we want to make sustainable, great products. Wolf is designed from the very beginning to deliver on our dream of great technology that doesn't hurt the earth. This is why we have chosen highly recyclable components and have achieved an amazing energy efficiency. Our stretch goals will also enable us to improve our environmental credentials - but we can only get there with your help. 
We also don't like the idea of retiring your old Wolf just because a new model has come out. To ensure your Wolf can grow old with you we've made it USB updatable. When a new Wolf gets released you'll be able to plug your existing lights in and get all of the latest features. Its our way of giving back a little.
The clever Wolf rear light with Collective Safety
Tech Specs: 
We know you love the nitty-gritty. So here it is in all its grizzly glory. You've got two options: you can read the summary below, or head over to the Wolf website to read the full rundown of Wolf's tech specs. 
165 Lumens Front / 35 Lumens Rear
Dual / Triple CREE LED with optimised optics
Cordless internal lithium polymer batteries (950mAh front, 850mAH rear).
7 hours battery life on High Intensity Strobe mode
USB charging (compatible with most modern smartphone chargers too)
IP56 Rating for Dust and Water Ingress
What's in the Box: 
Every pair of Wolf lights is carefully packaged in our branded shipping case. Made from recycled card and screen printed with the Augur logo, your Wolf lights will arrive in perfect shape and order. Inside, you'll find: 
1x Front Light with attached silicone strap
1x Rear Light with attached silicone strap
Charging cables (2x USB charging cables, compatible with any 5v USB port)
QuickStart Guide
Invitation to the Peloton Pack - Wolf's online community at Augur.net.au
If you order an Alphas Earlybird special, you'll also find your commemorative certificate inside. Everyone receives our heartfelt thanks. 
PRODUCTION PLAN - GETTING WOLF TO YOU
Sept 2013: First prototype (ACHIEVED)
May 2014: Product Design finalised (DONE!)
June 2014: Initial supplier talks (SORTED)
October 2014: Final prototype (YEP, DONE THAT TOO)
November 2014: Finalisation of supplier arrangements
December 2014: Initial tooling production
January 2015: Initial parts production and quality checks
January - February 2015: Full production run to produce orders
March 2015: Assembly, quality assurance, packaging
End March 2015: Shipping and order fulfilment. 
WOLF, AUGUR AND OUR MISSION
I founded Augur in August 2014 in Melbourne, Australia. I graduated from a Bachelor of Mechanical Engineering at Swinburne University of Technology (Australia) in 2012. After working for several years as a project engineer in one of Australia’s largest engineering companies, I wanted to start a company that made sustainable, technologically advanced products for specialist markets. As an avid cyclist, Wolf was naturally my first product idea. 

By backing Wolf on Kickstarter, you are joining a process with considerable momentum. Advanced prototypes have already been completed, the design is at a refinement stage and I am already looking at our shipping and packaging arrangements. Wolf is very far along the development process. Your commitment to Wolf enables payment for tooling and manufacturing, the final step before Wolf is a reality. 

We want you to become a part of our community. Augur's website is home to the Peloton Pack, an online discussion space where we can work together to develop new product ideas, discuss Wolf and all enjoy our passion for cycling together. We do hope you'll enjoy your time with Wolf and if it keeps you and your team safer, we have all done our jobs - you included. 
As seen on:
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We've done as much of the work for Wolf as we can before we look at production and shipping. Our prototypes are at very advanced stages and this means there is less risk involved than if we were starting with our idea. Most of the risks at this stage are related to delays in component deliveries, but we thought we should talk you through what we've done to minimise these risks: 

- Scaling Production

Our prototypes have been produced in small batches of 10 units. Scaling to meet the demand of a Kickstarter with an open ended number of orders could represent a challenge in a short time frame. We have been building relationships with a number of suppliers to be able to flexibly adjust production capacity when the need arises. This means that we can bring on additional production capacity in a large production run and still be on track for our delivery estimates. 

- Component Production and Availability

While we can adjust for scaling through bringing on additional suppliers, changes in component production rates and availability can impact our shipping estimates. We have a strong relationship with our component suppliers and are confident they will inform us of any large or rush orders they might receive that could delay the delivery of components necessary for Wolf. 

- Minor design and functionality changes. 

We're including this as a risk but we see it as an opportunity. Based on feedback from the Kickstarter process we could make minor changes to the design and functionality of Wolf, such as increasing the battery life, decreasing run times, opting for slightly different materials. We will keep you informed about any such changes and we actively encourage your feedback as we move through this Kickstarter campaign.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
